loans.name: Anahit

texts.en:
Anahit lives in Vaghatin village, Sisian region. She has been involved in agriculture for more than 11 years. 
Her farm includes livestock of 16 sheep and arable land where she cultivates potato and grass for feeding livestock. 
Anahit lives with her husband and 24-years-old son who help her with farming activities. 
To expand her livestock by 5 more sheep, Anahit asks this loan. 
She has taken a loan from local financial institutions before, but because of very difficult financial conditions, wasn't able to pay it back on time. Now, by ensuring that her farming business is successful and she is able to provide monthly payments for this loan, Anahit has been approved for this loan. She has now been approved for a loan within the framework of a new joint initiative between Kiva and SEF international. The second chance loan program provides loans to people who have a bad credit history and have no access to credit products.

loans.use: to pay for 5 sheep

loans.name: Dilshad

texts.en: Dilshad  is a 45-year-old married woman. She is a mother of 2 children. She sells wood, which is used in various purposes like furniture, papers and baskets. She has been efficiently doing this business with her son who is also shown in the photo. They serve well in their community. She needs to have an increase in her earning to support everyday expenditures of her family. To help her continue business operations, she has requested a Murabaha loan of PKR 30,000 to buy different types of wood along with cutters to cater to more customers.

loans.use: to buy different types of wood along with cutters to cater to more customers.

loans.name: Mark's Group

texts.en:
"Pictured above is Mark, who, as a group leader, is representing his group formed by 11 farmers in Kakamega North District, Kenya. He is married and is a father to 2 children, and is known by his community as a very hardworking individual.

Initially, Mark joined One Acre Fund in 2010 because he wanted to get the best quality fertilizer and hybrid seeds. Since he joined the program he says that his life has improved, especially because he has learned a lot from farming trainings. With the profits from the coming harvesting season, Mark plans to repair his home.

Between the 11 farmers in Mark's Group, a total of 5.5 acres of land will be planted using the maize seeds and fertilizer received with the loan. Additionally, some of the farmers in the group will be purchasing a solar light so, with this loan, the group will also receive a total of 3 solar lights."

loans.use: to purchase hybrid seeds and fertilizer to improve harvests of maize

loans.name: Naghma

texts.en:
Naghma is a 43-year-old married woman.  The man shown in the photo is her son.  2 years ago Naghma started a business selling cloth in her locality.  She purchases cloth of different varieties at low prices from the city market and sells them in her own town.  She has a strong customer base.

Naghma has requested a loan of 30,000 PKR to buy a greater variety of cloth in different colors for her business.  She expects a boost in her earnings with her loan.

loans.use: to buy a greater variety of cloth in different colors for her business.

loans.name: Shehnaz

texts.en:
Shehnaz, 51 years old, is a married woman and a mother of 4 children. One of her sons (also shown in photo) has been successfully running a shop keeping business for many years.  He offers a variety of daily use products and has a good client base.  

In order to avoid shortages, her son needs to have various goods in stock to efficiently meet customer demand.  Therefore Shehnaz has obtained a Murabaha loan of 30,000 PKR for her son to buy additional grocery items including oil, milk, sugar and juices to consistently meet customer demands in order to increase earnings.

loans.use: to buy additional grocery items including oil, milk, sugar, and juices to consistently meet customer demands.

loans.name: Christine's Group

texts.en:
Christine, pictured above, is a group leader and is representing her group, formed by 11 farmers in Kakamega North District, Kenya. She joined One Acre Fund for the first time in 2010 and decided to represent her group because she wanted to help more farmers. She is married and has four children.

With a portion of this loan, Christine will not only purchase maize seeds and fertilizer for the coming harvesting season, but also a solar light. Receiving a solar light as part of her loan means that now she will be able to have light during dark hours for her children to be able to study. Christine plans to use the profits she gains this year to send her children to school.

In total Christine’s Group will use the inputs received from this loan to plant a total of 7.75 acres of land. They will also receive a total of four solar lights.

loans.use: to buy cost-efficient maize seeds and fertilizer for the coming harvesting season, as well as a solar light.

loans.name: Asma

texts.en: Asma is a 33-year-old married woman. The man shown in the photo is her husband. Three years ago she started a business selling cloth in her locality. She purchases cloth of different varieties at low prices from the city market and sells them in her own town. She has a strong customer base. Currently, Asma has requested a loan of 25,000 PKR for herself. She wants to buy a greater variety of winter cloth in different colors for her business. She expects a boost in her earnings with her loan.

loans.use: to buy a greater variety of winter cloth in different colors for her business

loans.name: Gulshah

texts.en:
Gulshah is a 57-year-old woman and is married with 4 young children.  All of her children are married and her husband is old.  Her son sometimes helps her raising the family.  They live in the Sabirabad region of Azerbaijan.  She is a very kind and hard-working woman.  She has been raising poultry on her land for 33 years and always takes care of them.  

Gulshah enjoys feeding her poultry and sells her poultry at the local bazar.  Her poultry is tasty and healthy.  She does not have any problems selling because her clients like her kind face.  Her monthly income is 160 manat, but is not enough for her.  

Gulshah needs to improve her business and can earn more income if she builds a larger place for her hens, and has applied for a 1,500 AZN to build the enclosure.

loans.use: to build a new place for her hens.

loans.name: Victor Manuel

texts.es:
Víctor, se ha decidió por un nuevo crédito por necesidad de tener los materiales necesarios para continuar trabajando en la agricultura, comprara herbicidas, semilla, abono e insecticidas para preparar la tierra en la que cultivara granos básicos.
Al invertir el crédito anterior en los trabajos agrícolas de la temporada pasada, obtuvo con ello una cosecha abundante de granos básicos, abasteció a su familia de alimento y a sus clientes con el producto demandado.
texts.en: Victor has decided to apply for a new loan out of a need to have the materials necessary to continue working in agriculture, purchase herbicides, seeds, manure and insecticides to prepare the soil in which he'll plant staple foods. Upon investing the previous loan in farm work last season, he obtained an abundant harvest of staple foods, provided his family with food, and his customers with the requested product.

loans.use: To purchase herbicides, seeds, manure and insecticide to prepare the soil in which he'll plant staple foods.

loans.name: Segundo

texts.es:
Segundo tiene 63 años de edad, solo pudo estudiar hasta 4° grado en la escuela, está casado y tiene dos hijos, uno de 36 años y una niña de 6 años la cual está estudiando en el kínder, su esposa se dedica a la costura y juntos trabajan para darle lo necesario a su pequeña hija.

Segundo es sastre, este trabajo lo aprendió de su esposa, ellos elaboran uniformes para los estudiantes de dos escuelas, también se dedica a la crianza de pollo y trabaja con una pecera, estos trabajos los realiza en su hogar por lo tanto no tiene horario de trabajo específico pues lo hace desde la mañana hasta que anochece. 

Él necesita muchísimo de este crédito para comprar hilo, tela, zipper y otros materiales necesarios para la elaboración de uniformes y comprará concentrado para pollos y para los peces.

El sueño de Segundo es poder hacer una galera para la crianza de pollos y así aumentar la producción, desea comprar dos máquinas más para hacer más uniformes y seguir generando ingresos económicos en su hogar.
texts.en:
Segundo is 63 years old. He was only able to study until the fourth grade in school. He is married and has two children, a 36-year-old and a 6-year-old daughter who is in kindergarden. His wife makes a living sewing, and together they work to provide for their little daughter.

Segundo is a tailor, a trade he learned from his wife. They make uniforms for the schoolchildren. They also make a living raising chickens and maintain a fish tank. They work out of their home, so they do not have a specific work schedule, rather they work from morning until nightfall. 

He needs a lot of this loan to buy thread, fabric, zipper, and other necessary materials to make uniforms, and he will buy feed for the chickens and the fish.

Segundo's dream is to be able to make a chicken pen for raising the chickens and in that way increase production. He wants to buy two more machines to make more uniforms and continue generating income in his home.

loans.use: To buy thread, fabric, zipper, and other necessary materials to make uniforms and to buy feed for chickens and fish

loans.name: Maira Janeth

texts.es: Maira de 30 años es una mujer dedicada al trabajo de campo la siembra y cultivo de café es la fuente de ingresos en su familia con la cual han logrado salir poco a poco pues su familia gracias a este rubro pudo apoyarle en sus estudios básicos como ser la primaria. Su compañero de hogar también es agricultor con quien procreó 2 hijos quienes están pequeños y aun no asisten a la escuela ni al kinder. Siendo la siembra y cultivo de café el único ingreso y forma de generar en la familia tienen una parcela de tierra cultivada con café del tipo 90 teniendo una experiencia de más de 10 años de trabajar de forma independiente y salir adelante siendo sus padres quienes le heredaran y le enseñaran a trabajar. Los clientes para este preciado grano aromático son los diferentes intermediarios y beneficios de la zona siendo sus mejores ventas al inicio y final de cada año. Su propiedad está ubicada a 1 hora de camino desde su casa de habitacion aproximadamente siendo esta una desventaja para estar más al cuidado de la misma por lo que en muchas ocasiones pagan a un vecino que les ayude a vigilar la misma y evitar el descuido. Por ello solicita financiamiento el cual utilizara para la compra de fertilizantes, abonos, foliares y pago de mano de obra para limpiar y abonar la propiedad ya que el mismo ayudara a dar una mejor asistencia y con la fe en Dios su cosecha será abundante y traerá muchas bendiciones a su familia.  Sus planes en un futuro invertir la mayor parte de las ganancias en la siembra de más plantas de café, ver a sus hijos convertidos en profesionales y dedicados al cuidado de la propiedad la cual es fuente de ingresos en la familia y por ultimo hacer mejoras físicas a su casa de habitación la cual las necesita.
texts.en: Maira is 30 years old and works in the field planting and growing coffee which is the source of income that has enabled them to get ahead little by little. Thanks to this business her family was able to support her basic education, like elementary school. Her co-habiting partner is also a farmer with whom she has had two children who are young and not yet attending school, not even kindergarten. Since planting and growing coffee has been the only source of income in the family they have a plot of land that has been cultivated with type 90 coffee. They have over 10 years of experience working independently and getting ahead, and her parents are the ones that gave her and taught her this work. The customers for this coveted, aromatic bean are the various intermediaries and the benefits of the area are the higher sales at the beginning and end of each year. Her property is located approximately one hour away from her residence which is a disadvantage when it comes to tending to it so on many occasions they pay a neighbor to help keep an eye on the crops and avoid neglect. This is why she's applying for financing that she will use to purchase fertilizers, manure, leaf applied fertilizers, and pay for labor to clean and fertilize the property which will help provide greater assistance and God willing bring an abundant harvest and many blessings for her family. Her plans for the future are to invest the majority of the profits in sowing a higher number of coffee plants, see her children become professionals and committed to caring for the property, which has been the family's source of income, and lastly make needed improvements to her home.

loans.use: To purchase fertilizers, manure and pay for labor to help with her coffee crops.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for fabrics needed in her sewing business.

loans.name: Herson Enoc

texts.es:
Herson, utilizo el crédito anterior para adquirir insumos agrícolas y arrendar más tierras para cultivar maíz, el resultado ha sido una cosecha abundante, mejores ingresos y un cambio de estilo de vida familiar. Actualmente ha incorporado el cultivo de plátano, ya tiene muchas plantas sembradas e inician a dar sus frutos.
Como su negocio está prosperando necesita de un nuevo crédito para comprar abono, herbicidas, semillas, insecticidas y para pagar el arrendamiento de las tierras en las que cultiva, dará buen trato a las cultivo de plátanos y llevara a cabo la siembra de granos básicos.
texts.en:
Herson used the previous loan to acquire agricultural inputs and to lease more land to cultivate corn. The result has been an abundant harvest, better revenue, and a change in family lifestyle. Now he has added banana farming; he has already planted many plants, and they are starting to bear fruits.

Since his business is prospering, he needs another loan to buy fertilizer, herbicides, seeds, insecticides, and to lease the land he cultivates. They will be good for his banana farming and subsequently for planting basic grains.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer, herbicides, seeds, insecticides, and to lease the land he cultivates.

loans.name: Mario Ernesto

texts.es:
Mario, vive con su esposa y un hijo menor de edad, es propietario de una carpintería, el oficio lo aprendió siendo un jovencito, luego se decidió a realizar la apertura de su propia carpintería, desde entonces es su fuente principal de ingresos, trabaja solo y sin un horario establecido, cuando las demandas de sus servicios son altas contrata personas por obras para ser puntual en sus entregas.
El crédito que está solicitando lo invertirá en la reparación de su vehículo propio, pues en el traslada el material y hace las entregas de sus productos, espera agilizar sus trabajos para tener mejores ingresos y cancelar su deuda con puntualidad.
Sus sueños son tener una carpintería más popular y sacar a su familia adelante.
texts.en: Mario lives with his wife and minor child, owns a carpentry workshop, and learned the trade as a young man. Later he decided to open his own carpentry workshop, which has since been his main source of income. He works on his own without a fixed schedule, and when demand for his services is high he hires people for jobs so he can be punctual with his deliveries. The loan he's applying for is to invest in repairing his own vehicle, since he uses it to transport material and make his product deliveries. He hopes to speed up his jobs to have more income and cancel his debt in a timely fashion. His dreams are to make his carpentry workshop more popular and get his family ahead.

loans.use: To invest in repairing his own vehicle, since he uses it to transport materials and make product deliveries.

loans.name: Zhenishbu

texts.ru: Женишбу 38 лет, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают 4 детей. У Женишбу- среднее образование, вместе с мужем она занимается животноводством и полеводством, стартовав 20 лет назад, с покупки скота на 5,000 сом (KGS). Благодаря упорному труду Женишбу, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 3 лошади, 2 коровы, 10 овец. Ежемесячный доход составляет 10,000 сом (KGS), также обрабатывает 1,30 ГА земли, где в основном выращивает ячмень. В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Женишбу обратилась в Банк "Бай-Тушум" за кредитом в сумме 35,000 сом (KGS) на покупку нетели для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Женишбу планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины и хочет накопить средства на ремонт дома.
texts.en: Zhenishbu is 38 years old and she is married.  She lives with her husband and they are raising four children.  She has a high school education and she raises livestock and grows crops with her husband.  They started doing this 20 years ago with the purchase of livestock for 5,000 som (KGS).  Thanks to her hard work, Zhenishbu now has three horses, two cows and ten sheep on her farm.  Their monthly income is 10,000 som (KGS), and they also work a 1.30 hectare plot of land, on which they grow barley.  With the goal of developing her business further, Zhenishbu has turned to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 35,000 som (KGS) to buy heifers to increase her head of livestock.  She plans to use the income from this loan to further increase her head of livestock and she wants to save up money to make repairs on her home.

loans.use: to buy a heifer in order to increase her head of livestock

loans.name: Fatoumata's Group

texts.fr:
Ce groupe est créé depuis janvier 2011,il est composé de membres qui habitent le même village,elles pratiquent le commerce.Elles partagent entre elles une responsabilité solidaire pour le remboursement de leur crédit.

Hawa qui se trouve à droite de la photo et levant le bras,est la responsable du groupe,elle est âgée de 63 ans et mére de 05 filles.

Son activité est la restauration,elle dispose d'une longue expérience pour ce type d'activité.

Avec le crédit,elle compte acheter 05 sacs de riz à 12000f le sac,un bidon de 20l pour 15000f et le reste des ingrédients pour préparer la cuisine du restaurant.

Son objectif est de renforcer son fonds de roulement et son épargne,aussi participer aux charges liées à la nourriture de sa famille
texts.en:
This group was created in January 2011. It consists of members who are from the same village and are retail merchants. They share a joint responsibility in repaying their credit loan.

Hawa, who is raising her arm on the right of the photo, is the leader of the group. She is 63 years old and the mother of five daughters.

Her activity is catering, and she has acquired extensive experience in this type of activity.

She intends to use the loan to buy five bags of rice at 12,000 francs a bag, one 20-liter container (of culinary oil) for 15,000 francs, and the remaining ingredients for food preparations.

Her objective is to bolster her working capital and savings, and also participate in expenses related to the family's nourishment.

loans.use: buy rice, culinary oil and ingredients

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy farming supplies for her vegetable crops

loans.name: Vidadi

texts.en:
Vidadi is a 40-year-old married man with 3 children who are studying at school. They are a happy family although they are poor. 

Vidadi has been working in a post office for 10 years distributing letters. He loves his work but the salary is not good for his family.
He has a monthly income of 160 Manat (AZN) but this money cannot cover his family‘s needs.

Vidadi doesn't have potable water at home, and this makes daily problems for his family. When he returns home he has to fetch water from a neighbor. He dreams of putting in a water supply to his kitchen and bathroom because he wants to provide for his family.

For this reason he has applied for 1,000 AZN from Aqroinvest. Please help him!

loans.use: to put in a water supply to his kitchen and bathroom.

loans.name: Jaime Abdier

texts.es: Jaime es un joven recién graduado de Ingeniero Agrónomo Zootecnista. Con 22 años ha trabajado desde corta edad en diferentes actividades agropecuarias de su familia. Con los conocimientos adquiridos en los estudios y la experiencia ganada en la familia, pretende invertir el préstamo solicitado en la ceba de ganado para iniciar un negocio personal. Con $2,100 puede comprar siete terneros a media ceba para iniciar su proyecto. Espera que esta inversión le ayude a consolidar su sueño como pequeño productor agropecuario. Para ello cuenta también con la orientación y experiencia de sus padres, quienes también participan en la Empresa Comunal y motivan a su joven hijo a emprender este tipo de negocio.
texts.en:
Jaime recently graduated as an Agronomic and Zootechnical Engineer.   At 22 years old he has worked since he was very young in different agricultural activities with his family.  With the knowledge learned through his education and the experience gained through his family, he is requesting a loan to begin his own business raising cattle.

He plans to use $2,100 to buy seven calves to begin his project.  He hopes the investment will help realize his dream of becoming a small livestock producer.  He trusts in the guidance and experience of his parents who are also members of the communal bank and encourage their young son to start this type of business.

loans.use: To buy six calves.

loans.name: Khitab

texts.en: Khitab is a 55-year-old married woman. She has been running a business selling milk for many years with the help of her husband. She sells the milk in her area. Her business is doing well enough to pay for her family’s expenses. She has five children; she is a dedicated mother and wants the best for her children. Now, she has requested a Murabaha loan of 30,000 PKR to purchase one more buffalo for milking. She is hopeful that she will be able to fulfill her dream of providing better living conditions for her children.

loans.use: to purchase one more buffalo for milking.

loans.name: Tasleem

texts.en: Tasleem, 44 years old, is a married woman and a mother of three children (one of her sons is also shown in the photo). Her husband (shown in the photo) has been successfully running a shop-keeping business for many years. He offers a variety of daily use products and has a good client base. In order to avoid shortages, he needs to have various goods in stock to efficiently meet customer demand. Therefore, Tasleem has availed a Murabaha loan of PKR 30,000 for her husband to buy additional grocery items including oil, milk, sugar and juices to consistently meet customers’ demands in order to make better earnings.

loans.use: to buy additional grocery items including oil, milk, sugar and juices to consistently meet customers’ demands

loans.name: Rubina

texts.en: Rubina is a 35-year-old married woman and a mother of four children. The man shown in the photo is her husband. He has been running a food stall for a period of about nine years. He sells fast food items such as burgers, French fries, shawarmas etc. and earns sufficient income to cover the family’s expenditures. For the improvement of her husband’s business, Rubina has availed a Murabaha loan of 35,000 PKR for her husband to buy crockery and utensils along with packs of oil, spices, buns, ketchup, mayonnaise etc. It will help him to increase his sales and profits as well.

loans.use: to buy crockery and utensils along with packs of oil, spices, buns, ketchup, mayonnaise etc.

loans.name: Rolando Wilfredo

texts.es:
Rolando de 30 años de edad está acompañado y su pareja trabaja en la venta de productos básicos, tiene un hijo que está estudiando en el kínder, con Rolando viven sus padres y dos hermanos, pero solo dos personas dependen de él.
Rolando es empleado, tiene 6 años de trabajar en una empresa distribuidora de agua, también en los tiempos libres trabaja como mecánico, su trabajo está a dos horas en motocicleta y su horario es de 8:00 am a 4:00 pm. 
El préstamo lo invertirá para comprar ladrillos y cemento y construir un muro en su casa, mejorará su vida ya que podrá vivir mejor y con mayor seguridad. 
Él planea construir su propia casa y comprarse un automóvil, que su hijo estudie y tenga un mejor futuro.
texts.en:
Rolando, 30, has a partner and she works selling basic products.  His son attends kindergarten.  They live with his parents and two siblings but only two people depend on him.

For six years Rolando has been working for a water distribution company.  Also, in his free time he works as a mechanic.  His work is two hours away by motorcycle and his work schedule is fro 8:00 a.m. to 4:00 p.m.

The loan will be used to buy bricks and cement to build a wall around his house.  This will improve the living conditions and make the house safer.  He plans to build his own house and buy an automobile, as well as give his children an education for a better future.

loans.use: To buy bricks and cement to build a wall around his house.

loans.name: Bethel Group

texts.en: Nianggou, a young lady of 27 years, is pictured with her hand raised. She is the profiled member of the group ‘Bethel.’ Nianggou has been weaving manually for the past three years as a means to support herself and her family. She lives with her mother and younger siblings. She chooses to weave and earn money since her father passed away. He had been the main source of income in the family. She has a differently able younger sister who needs a lot of attention at home. Nianggou and her mother weave manually at home to support their family. Nianggou weaves traditional wraparound skirts and sells them to customers. The income from weaving is used in household maintenance. They choose to work at home with the thought that her sister is given full attention and support. She wishes to own a hand loom, which is work efficient. The loan will be use to buy a hand loom that will make Nianggou’s work faster and smoother. It will help her family to achieve their financial goal and contribute to their family’s well-being. She and her family give thanks to the lenders. The rest of the group members are all very committed to their businesses and the loan will help to improve their businesses.

loans.use: To buy a handloom to weave beautiful traditional wraparound skirts.

loans.name: Santos Noel

texts.es:
Santos de 33 años de edad está acompañado, estudió hasta primer año de bachillerato, actualmente tiene dos hijos, y solo uno estudia primer grado de primaria. 

Santos se dedica a la agricultura y a la pesca artesanal, aprendió el trabajo de la agricultura ya que sus padres y hermanos se dedicaban a lo mismo, además en ocasiones trabaja de albañil, de manera que le gusta aprender varios oficios para que nunca le falte el trabajo.

Él necesita el dinero para comprar cerámica para ponerle a su casa, también comprará cemento y pegamento. 

Su sueño es que sus hijos sean profesionales, que tengan su propio negocio pues piensa que es duro trabajar fuertemente y no ganar lo justo.
texts.en:
Santos, 33, has a ninth grade education.  He and his partner have two children, one of whom is in first grade.

Santos works in agriculture and artisan fishing.  He learning farming from his parents and siblings who are in the same activity.  Sometimes he works as a bricklayer and enjoys doing different jobs so he always has work.

He is in need of a loan to buy tile for his house, as well as cement and glue.

His dream is for his children to become professionals and have their own businesses because he believes it is difficult to work hard and not earn a decent wage.

loans.use: To buy tile for his house, as well as cement and glue.

loans.name: Rani

texts.en:
Rani has successfully built her business selling milk with the support of Kashf Foundation and Kiva. Her husband also assists her in selling milk door-to-door on his motorcycle. She has now attained a good number of customers and makes a good amount of income to contribute to the family income.
 
Previously with the help of Kiva she was able to expand her business. Now she is in her 9th loan cycle and has applied for a loan of 60,000 PKR to purchase another cow. This will enable her to increase her milk sales to more cities and to gain more profits.

loans.use: to purchase another cow.

loans.name: Ameeran

texts.en: Ameeran has successfully built her business selling milk with the support of Kashf Foundation and Kiva. By this time, she has attained a good number of customers and makes good amount of income to contribute to the family income. Previously, with the help of Kiva, she was able to expand her business. Now she is in her eighth loan cycle and has applied for a loan of 60,000 PKR to purchase another cow. This will enable her to increase her milk sales to more cities and to gain more profits.

loans.use: to purchase another cow.

loans.name: Merlinda

texts.en:
Merlinda is grateful that she was granted a 51,000 PHP loan, which she used to purchase various grocery items and products needed in her general store. Through her earnings, she is able to send her children to school and meet their daily living expense. 

She would now like to apply for another 51,000 PHP loan, which she will use partly to buy quantities of grocery items like rice, coffee, soda, rice noodles, and frozen foods to sell and partly to add another unit in her apartment to rent. She is thanking God and you in advance for a good return on her investment, hard work and the financial help that will be given to her. Her income from her store and apartment helps cover the school needs of her children and their daily sustenance.

Merlinda dreams of having a bigger General Store and be able to build their dream house. Every week, she meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work and to draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God which she studies .

 *All Center for Community Transformation (CCT) community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital  and repay Micro-Finance loans.

loans.use: to buy quantities of grocery items like rice, coffee, soda, rice noodles, and frozen foods to sell and to add another unit in her apartment to rent

loans.name: Koryun

texts.en:
Koryun is a photographer. He opened a photography studio last year where he provides video and photo shooting services for local people living in Vanadzor town.
 
Koryun now wants to expand his studio and the services he provides to his customers. He has rented a new studio in the center of Vanadzor town, which he thinks will increase demand so he will have more customers.
 
To provide a better quality service to his customers, Koryun is asking lenders to support him in purchasing technical systems for professional photography, and furniture for his studio.
 
He has been approved for a loan within the framework of a new joint initiative between Kiva and SEF International. This start-up loan program provides business start-up loans with soft conditions to informal businesses that do not have access to credit products.

loans.use: to pay for technical systems for professional photography, and purchase furniture for his studio

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: buy chairs, tables and a stove for her restaurant

loans.name: Doris Elizabeth

texts.es:
Doris de 32 años de edad estudió hasta bachillerato, está casada y su esposo trabaja en una granja avícola. Tienen 4 hijos que viven con ellos y 2 estudian 6° y 1° grado. Con su esposo son los encargados de mantener el hogar y a sus hijos.

Doris tiene el negocio de compra y venta de ganado, desde hace 2 años y lo aprendió por medio de un vecino que tiene ganado, y ella decidió tener su negocio aparte y es su esposo quien se encarga de venderlo a quien lo pague mejor.
 
El préstamo lo solicita para comprar una vaca con el fin de reproducirla y así incrementar el negocio.
 
Su sueño es tener ganado propio y no depender de otra gente, así para invertir en la educación de sus hijos y reparar la casa.
texts.en:
Doris, 32, has a high school education, is married and her husband works on a poultry farm.  They have four children who live at home; two of them attend school, one is in sixth and the other in first grade.  Doris and her husband share the responsibility for the household and the children.

Doris buys and sells cattle and has been in business for two years after learning about it from a neighbor.  She decided to set up her own business and her husband is the one responsible for sales at the best price.

The loan she is requesting is to buy a cow and reproduce cattle herself to increase business.  Her dream is to have her own cattle and not depend on anyone else.   She wants to invest in her children's education and repair her house.

loans.use: To buy a cow and raise livestock.

loans.name: Linda Rosmeri

texts.es: Linda es una joven de 25 años de edad, madre de 2 hijos que viven con ella y su compañero de hogar. Se desempeña como agricultora la siembra y cultivo de café es su especialidad la cual aprendió desde adolescente pero también cultiva maíz, frijol, plátano y hortalizas. Como medio alternativo de ingresos es la cría de cerdos y gallinas pues de esta forma también genera más ingresos para poder apoyar a sus hijos en sus estudios escolares. Por el factor económico Linda únicamente pudo cursar su primaria pues ella no deja de luchar y tener la esperanza de poder cursar un taller en computación ya que ella considera en estos tiempos es muy importante tener el vasto conocimiento sobre esta profesión pues es una de las cuales abre puertas para poder obtener un empleo. Sus metas en este nuevo año es la limpieza de 10 tareas de tierra, sembrar 3000 plantillas de café aumentando de esta manera la producción de la misma y generando mayores ingresos en su familia pues ella desea construir una casa de habitacion con 3 cuartos sala y comedor con bastante espacio para que sus hijos puedan correr y crecer en un mejor ambiente. Sus sueños ver a sus hijos graduados convertidos en profesionales y en personas exitosas las cuales sean prosperas en la vida a pesar de los diferentes obstáculos que ella pueda enfrentar para que ellos puedan salir adelante. Linda solicita apoyo económico para la compra de fertilizantes, abonos, foliares y el pago de mano de obra para dar a su propiedad una excelente asistencia y dar a los insumos un mejor aprovechamiento para poder cubrir la zona con plantación y evitar esta se deteriore por alguna plaga.
texts.en:
Linda, 25, is a young mother with two children who live with her and her partner.  She grows coffee for a living, having learned the activity in her youth.  She also grows corn, beans, bananas and vegetables.  To earn extra income she raises pigs and hens.  This is so she can support her children in their education.  For economic reasons Linda only has a grade school education.  But she struggles ahead with the hope of taking a computer workshop because she feels it is very important to gain knowledge about her profession.  It is also a way to open doors for employment.

Her goals for this year are to clean 10 areas of land, plant 3,000 coffee plants to increase production and generate more income for the family.  She wants to build a three bedroom house with a large dining room so the children have room to play and grow up in a better environment.  She wants her children to graduate and become successful professionals so they can prosper in life despite the many obstacles they will find.

Linda is requesting a loan to buy fertilizers and leaf treatment, and to hire labor to provide excellent care with the supplies.  She wants to cover the whole plantation and avoid any type of plant disease.

loans.use: To buy farm supplies for her coffee crop and hire workers.

loans.name: Noor

texts.en: Noor is 42 years old; she is a married woman.  She deals in the business of selling animals. She buys animals (baby goats and calves) at low prices, raises them and then sells them in the market at higher prices. She makes enough through her business to contribute to the family income. She also sells milk to generate an extra amount of income. She needs to improve her business to bear her household expenses. For this reason, she contacted Kashf Foundation and applied for a loan of PKR 45,000 to purchase more animals to increase her sales. She is very experienced and has good contacts in the market. With this loan, she will definitely expand her business and income level.

loans.use: to purchase more animals to increase her sales.

loans.name: Sakeena

texts.en: Sakeena is 50 years old, married and a mother of four children. The income generated by her husband is insufficient to cover all the household expenses, so she initiated her business of milk sales. She has been doing it for many years and has become famous for providing good quality milk in her locality. With the support of Kashf Foundation, she has gradually improved her business; currently she has requested a loan of 60,000 PKR to purchase another buffalo to increase her sales and earn profits to provide her family with the basic necessities of life.

loans.use: to purchase another buffalo to increase her sales and earn profits to provide her family with the basic necessities of life.

loans.name: Kenzhey

texts.ru: Кенжей 31 год, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают 2 детей. У Кенжей - среднее образование. Она занимается животноводством и полеводством, стартовав 8 лет назад, с покупки скота на 7,000 сом (KGS). Благодаря упорному труду Кенжей, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 2 коровы, 11 овец. На ежедневной основе она продает молоко, также обрабатывает 8,50 ГА земли, где выращивает пшеницу, ячмень, картофель, эспарцет. Ежемесячный доход Кенжей составляет 16,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Кенжей обратилась в Банк "Бай-Тушум" за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS) на покупку бычков для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Кенжей планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины.
texts.en: Kenzhey is 31 years old, she is married and raising two children with her husband.  She has a high school education.  She raises livestock and grows crops, which she started doing eight years ago with the purchase of livestock for 7,000 som (KGS).  Thanks to her hard work, Kenzhey now has two cows and 11 sheep on her farm.  She sells milk daily and she also works a 8.5 hectare plot of land, on which she grows wheat, barley, potatoes and sainfoin.  Her monthly income is 16,000 som (KGS).  With the goal of improving her farm's output, Kenzhey has turned to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 50,000 som (KGS) to buy bulls to increase her head of livestock.  She plans to reinvest the income from this loan into further increasing her animal count on the farm.

loans.use: to purchase additional steers for fattening up and resale

loans.name: Senik

texts.en:
Last year Senik, a father of a son, started his retail business. He trades in kids' clothing from his house. Senik purchases clothing from Yerevan town's market and sells it in his house in Vanadzor town.
 
To purchase new spring-summer stock of clothing for kids and be able to resell it to his customers, Senik asks for this loan. He has been approved for a loan within the framework of a new joint initiative between Kiva and SEF International. This start-up loan program provides business start-up loans with soft conditions to informal businesses that do not have access to credit products.

loans.use: to pay for spring-summer stock of clothing for kids to resell

loans.name: Sabita

texts.en:
Sabita is a 27-year-old married woman and a mother of two children. Her husband (shown in the photo) is a van driver by profession. He drives in the main city and makes enough income to cover all the expenses of his family. 

He wants to change the engine of his van, as it is causing a lot of pollution and is consuming too much oil for its work. That is why Sabita has availed a Murabaha loan of 25,000 PKR for her husband to buy a new engine for the van to provide better facilities to his customers. 

Sabita is hopeful that this loan will be a productive one for her husband and will bring positive changes to his business.

loans.use: to buy a new engine for her husband's van to provide better facilities to his customers.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: buy one or two oxen to fatten and resell

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: buy food products

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a new laptop for his studies

loans.name: Marcos Antonio

texts.es: Marcos es un hombre de 59 años de edad que vive con su esposa y sus 2 hijos ya mayores de edad que le apoyan con los gastos de su vivienda. Él es una persona que trabaja mucho desde joven para sacar adelante a su familia, apoyado en su venta de productos básicos en su vivienda lo que le ha permitido sostener a su familia. Marcos desea realizar mejoras a las paredes y techo de su vivienda ya que actualmente se encuentran deterioradas, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: cemento, arena, grava, lámina galvanizada, madera, etc. para mejorar las paredes y techo de su vivienda lo antes posible ya que desea realizar las mejoras en época seca para que el invierno no le afecte.
texts.en:
Marcos, age 59, lives with his wife and their two grown children who help with the household expenses.  He is a person who works a lot, eve since he was a young man, in order to get his family ahead.  He sells basic products at his house.  This has allowed him to support his family.

Marcos wishes to make improvements to the walls and roof of his house.  They are currently damaged.  Therefore, he is requesting a loan from FUSAI to buy cement, sand, wood, galvanized steel, and gravel to make improvements to the walls and roof of his house as soon as possible.  He wishes to make the improvements during the dry season so they will not be affected in the winter.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, and gravel to make improvements to the walls and floor of his house.

loans.name: Maria Erodita

texts.es: Doña Maria con su primer préstamo fue invertido en la compra de insumos para darle un mayor mantenimiento a plantas de café logro comprar foliar, oxigenador, una bomba de mochila y nutrí follaje con lo cual miró los avances en su plantación y con los días de haber hecho el mantenimiento en muy buenas condiciones. Ella está  muy agradecida por el apoyo brindado y también por la oportunidad que se le ha dado. Gracias a Dichos prestamos ella está logrando los objetivos que se había propuesto y ha obtenido mejor producción en la temporada pasada mejorando las ganancias y por ende los ingresos en su familia. En esta nueva ocasión ella solicita un nuevo financiamiento para invertir en su cafetal para esta temporada distribuyendo el mismo de la mejor manera posible como con su primer financiamiento para cada vez más mejorar la producción de su propiedad y la calidad en el aromático grano el cual es el factor primordial de elaborar esta actividad esperando pueda ser apoyada por los diferentes inversionistas en KIVA para salir adelante.
texts.en:
Ms. Maria's first loan was used to purchase supplies for the upkeep of her coffee plants. She was able to buy foliar fertilizer, an oxygenator, a backpack pump, and "Nutri-follaje" fertilizer, which enabled her to see improvements in her crop in just a few days. Ms. Maria is very thankful for the support and opportunity she has received. Thank to these loans she is reaching the goals she had set for herself and improved last season's production, along with her profits and hence her family's income. 

Ms. Maria is now requesting a loan to invest in her coffee plantation this season. She would like to invest it in the best possible way, like she did with her first loan. Her goal is to continually improve production and coffee quality. Financing is an essential factor in coffee cultivation and she hopes that KIVA investors may continue to support her so that she may succeed.

loans.use: to purchase farm supplies for her coffee crop and pay labor costs.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy lotions, cosmetics, body creams, dyes, etc. for resale and have the necessary funds to meet her commitments.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a new laptop for his studies

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To purchase some construction materials to build a kitchen inside her house.

loans.name: Karim

texts.en: Karim, 24 years old, is single and lives with his parents. Karim’s family members are IDP (İnternally Displaced Persons) from Agdam city and currently are living in Absheron region. Karim is an electrician master. Today he wants to support his business. He wants to buy new materials, which are necessary in his business. Therefore, Karim has applied for a loan in the amount of 900 AZN (Azerbaijan New Manat). Karim says great thanks to the Kiva organization for the loan. In the future, he wants to hire an assistant and in his personal life, he wants to get married.

loans.use: to buy materials to increase his business. In the future, he wants to get married.

loans.name: Maricela

texts.es: Maricela de 24 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo y su hija de 4 años, ella se dedica a la siembra y cultivo de café desde hace varios años así como también siembra arroz y maíz quien comercializa sus productos en los diferentes mercados de la comunidad, bodegas y con los clientes que ya tiene establecidos. Su grado de educación estudiantil es de secundaria incompleta la cual no pudo terminar por la falta de apoyo económico pues solo sus primeros tres años de ciclo común pudo realizar. La tierra que juntos trabajan es propia la cual está ubicada a 700 metros aproximadamente a la cual se desplaza caminando pues no cuentan con un medio de transporte. Ella está solicitando a COMIXMUL financiamiento para la compra de fertilizantes, abonos, Controles de Plagas, entre otros que ayudaran a mejorar el terreno que muestra en la fotografía el cual esta cultivado de café del tipo 90 y lempira y poder continuar con su trabajo y tener mejores opciones en esta nueva temporada y con su familia pues de ello depende como única fuente principal de ingresos.
texts.en:
Maricela is 24 years old and lives in her own house with her husband and 4-year-old daughter. She has been earning a living by growing coffee for several years. She also grows rice and corn and sells her product in various community markets, small grocery stores, and to established clients. She did not complete her secondary education due to lack of financial support and was only able to finish her first three years. The land that she farms with her husband is their own and is located 700 m from their home. She travels there on foot for lack of other means of transport.

Maricela is requesting a loan from COMIXMUL to purchase fertilizers, manure, and pesticides, among others, to improve the land show in the photograph. This lot is planted with coffee plants of the 90 and Lempira varieties. She hopes to be able to continue her work and have better options during this new season, as this is her family's only source of income.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers, manure, and foliar fertilizer, and to the pay labor costs of cleaning the property.

loans.name: Dieynaba

texts.fr:
Dieynaba évolue dans le commerce, où elle a acquis une expérience de plus de 5 ans. Elle est mariée et habite dans un village situé à environ 35km de la ville principale.
Dieynaba vend des produits cosmétiques et est active toute la journée entre 7h du matin et 13h et entre 16h et 19h du soir. Elle est commerçante ambulante et possède assez fidèle dans le voisinage. Elle gère ses propres besoins et appuie même son époux dans la gestion des dépenses quotidiennes du foyer. 
Se qualifiant toujours de débutante dans cette activité, elle souhaite élargir cela en se fixant, c'est-à-dire, chercher un local et le charger de produits cosmétiques en espérant que sa clientèle vienne la trouver sur place.
texts.en:
Dieynaba is developing a business, and has accumulated over five year's of experience. She is married and lives in a village about 35 kms from the big city. Dieynaba sells cosmetic products all day long - from 7am to 1pm in the mornings, and then from 4pm to 7pm in the afternoons. She is a mobile saleswoman and has a good loyal following locally.
She covers her own needs, and even assists her husband with the household expenses. Still considering herself a novice in this business, she would like to grow the activity by finding a shop space she can fill with cosmetics - hoping that her customers will seek her out there.

loans.use: to purchase cosmetic products for resale.

loans.name: Kor

texts.fr:
Monsieur Kor, est éleveur depuis plus de 10 ans. Il habite un village situé à environ 36km de la ville principale. Il a déjà bénéficié de cinq crédits soldés sans problèmes. Kor va acheter deux veaux et de l’aliment bétail pour les emboucher. Les bœufs arrivés à terme, il amenait les vendre dans les marchés hebdomadaires où il pourra avoir des offres les plus intéressantes. Il nourrit sa famille de son activité et s’occupe des autres charges de la maison.
 Ayant formé ses enfants pour qu’ils puissent faire l’activité et vu son âge, Kor veut prendre sa retraite et leur laisser l’activité, c’est son souci majeur.
texts.en:
Kor has been a farmer for over ten years. He lives in a village about 36 kms from the big city. He has already taken five loans which have been repaid without problems.
Kor is going to buy two cows, and animal feed for fattening them up. Once they are ready, he will take them for sale at the weekly markets where he will be able to obtain the best prices.
He feeds his family with this business, and also takes care of the other household expenses.
Having trained his children so that they are able to do the work, and in view of his age, Kor wishes to retire and leave the business to them - this is his principal concern.

loans.use: to buy two young cattle and animal feed to fatten them for resale.

loans.name: Najma

texts.en: Najma is 39 years old, married and has been running a business selling milk for many years with the help of her husband. She has buffaloes for milking purposes. She sells the milk in her area. Her business is doing well enough to pay for her family’s expenses. She has four children. She is a dedicated mother and wants the best for her children. She has taken many loans from Kashf Foundation. Now, she has requested a loan of 40,000 PKR to purchase one more buffalo to increase her milk sales to earn a good amount of income to fulfill her dream of providing better living conditions to her children.

loans.use: to purchase one more buffalo to increase her milk sales to earn a good amount of income

loans.name: Andromeda Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “ANDROMEDA” iniciará el cuarto ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Santiago II, está compuesta por ocho  integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Paola es la Presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: venta de cosméticos, venta de celulares, venta de busos y camisas, venta de libros, tienda de barrio, venta de mantas.

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Paola es integrante, ella indica que hace dos años que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por la invitación de su amiga que es cliente de la institución. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio venta de productos de belleza; da a conocer que este negocio lo inicio al observa a su amiga, quien comercializa el mismo productos, con amplio comercio es por ello que decide invertir un pequeño capital en este negocio 

El crédito que ahora sacará es para el aumento de capital (compra de productos de belleza para la venta) mismo que implementará en su espacio de venta para la comodidad de su clientela. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia económicamente, ya que ella es soltera.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta el área de salud que ofrece la institución.
texts.en:
The communal bank “ANDROMEDA” will begin its fourth loan cycle in Pro Mujer as part of the Santiago II Regional Office. The group has eight members and is led by an executive board with Ms. Paola as its president. The businesses of the communal association's members are varied and include sales of cosmetics, cellular phones, sweats, shirts, books, and blankets, and a general store. 

The loan requested will benefit the group of micro-entrepreneurs of which Ms. Paola is a member. She tells us that she became a member of Pro Mujer two years ago, after being invited by a friend who is a client of the organization. Ms. Paola currently runs a business selling beauty products, which she established after observing her friend, who successfully sold the same products. She then decided to invest a small sum on the business. The current loan is intended to increase her inventory (purchase beauty products for sale) for the convenience of her clients. This work enables her to generate income to financially support her family, as she is single. When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she stated that she liked the health services offered by the institution.

loans.use: Compra de productos de belleza por mayor

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase various products.

loans.name: Neha

texts.en: Neha is 24 years old and single. She is running a small beauty parlor in the corner of her house. She offers many facilities to her customers such as makeup, hair styling and facials. Through her best providing services, she has become very famous on her street. In order to meet the increasing demands of her customers, she is interested in buying more variety of cosmetics products for the parlor. That is why she has applied for a loan of 45,000 PKR to buy hair care products, skin products and hair rollers to treat more customers to gaining more profits.

loans.use: to buy hair care products, skin products and hair rollers to treat more customers and gain more profits.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase local cereal crops - millet, corn, beans - for resale.

loans.name: Anabel

texts.es: Anabel es una mujer emprendedora que busca constantemente donde invertir para salir adelante junto a su familia. Las necesidades de su niñez le han enseñado a ser persistente en lo que se propone. Entre otras actividades que realiza está la cría de gallinas de engorde. Tiene más de 20 años de hacer esta actividad y quiere aprovechar el apoyo de un préstamo de Kiva para comprar los materiales y ampliar la galera de los pollos. De esta forma pretende protegerlos de animales de monte que llegan a cazarlos. También quiere adquirir 500 pollos, en diferentes etapas de crecimiento, para incrementar su producción y ampliar el número de clientes que tiene en la comunidad de San Andrés y otras comunidades aledañas. Esto con el fin de tener mayores ingresos que le permitan mejorar su calidad de vida y el de su familia.
texts.en: Anabel is an entrepreneurial woman who constantly seeks ways to help her family succeed. The poverty she lived as a child taught her to be persistent in her goals. Among other activities, she raises broiler chickens. Anabel has been raising broiler chickens for more than 20 years and wants to leverage a Kiva loan to purchase materials and expand her chicken pen. She hopes that this will protect the chickens from attacks from wild animals. Anabel would also like to purchase 500 chickens at different stages of growth to increase her production and expand her client base in San Andrés and neighboring communities. Her goal is to increase her income and thus improve her and her family's quality of life.

loans.use: to expand the chicken pen to raise broiler chickens.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase cereals and condiments

loans.name: Afiq

texts.en:
Afiq is twenty-eight years old, married and has a daughter. Afiq has a plot of land where he grows barley and wheat. He has been working in the agricultural sector for six years. This works needs more labour and strength from  him. Afiq's monthly income is 190 AZN. It is not enough money for him but Afiq does not let this dampen his spirit. 

Afiq's main issue is water, as he cannot irrigate his land. He wants to develop his business and to grow more crops. To solve this problem, he needs to make a water canal to his land, so he can supply his family wellbeing. He applied for a loan of 500 AZN from Kiva to build the canal.

loans.use: to make a water canal

loans.name: Stella

texts.en:
Stella is thirty-seven and has a mixed farm where she is based with her family of four in the Nyamira area of Kenya. On the farm, she grows various crops and keeps dairy cattle and poultry. For the last six years, she has made money selling her farm's produce and engaging in other side businesses. She feels passionate about farming but her business is facing challenges such as the high cost of inputs and occasional drought. 

Stella is seeking a loan to purchase poultry. To Stella, the upside of focusing more on her poultry business is that it is not very much effected by the major challenges of high costs of farm inputs and drought. Poultry feed is readily available. Poultry also lay eggs regardless of time of year or season. This investment will provide a certain source of income all year round. The money Stella will make from this expansion will cater to her family expenses such as food and school fees. She wants her family to enjoy a balanced diet to grow strong and healthy so that they can be more productive towards generating income for the family. All that Stella is waiting for is your kindness.

loans.use: To buy poultry

loans.name: Aasya

texts.en: Aasya is a thirty-nine-year-old married woman. The man shown in the photo is her son-in-law. Aasya has been working in a business of cattle purchasing and sale for the past six years. After raising the small animals for a year or two, she sells them in the local market. Her business has provided her family with a decent life. She is very motivated to provide her family members a beautiful life with good food, health and clothing. For the growth of her business she has availed Murabaha of 30,000 PKR to purchase more cattle including baby goats and calves. She is hopeful that her business will generate greater revenues in the future.

loans.use: to purchase more cattle including baby goats and calves

loans.name: Saima

texts.en:
Saima is thirty-four years old and a married woman. The man shown in the photo is Saima ’s husband, who is a driver by profession and provides transportation services using his three-wheeled rickshaw. He has been driving a rickshaw for many years to cover the family's expenses, but now the rickshaw requires proper maintenance to keep it in its functional routine. 

For this reason, Saima  has applied for a loan of 40,000 PKR, for her husband. He wants to buy new tires with some auto spare parts and tools for his vehicle. This will help him drive more smoothly and provide better transport services to his passengers. Saima is hopeful that this loan will be a productive one for her husband and will bring positive changes to his business.

loans.use: to buy new tires, auto spare parts and tools for her husband's vehicle.

loans.name: Arcadio  Antonio

texts.es: Arcadio de 67 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa, desde hace 20 años se dedica a la agricultura siembra maíz y frijol, cuando su cosecha ya esta lista la almacena en sacos así como muestra en la fotografía, para luego comercializarlos en los alrededores de la zona donde el reside, el está solicitando un crédito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas, herbicidas, etc. y si poder seguir con sus cultivos y tener una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Arcadio is 67 years old and he lives with his wife in their own house.

He has made a living in agriculture for 20 years, growing corn and beans. After the harvest, he stores the grains in sacks (as you can see in the picture) to sell them around the area where he resides.

He requests this loan to buy seeds, fertilizers, pest control products, herbicides, etc. so that he can continue his work and improve his living conditions.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizers, pest control products, herbicides, etc.

loans.name: Vilma Haidee

texts.es: Vilma de 31 años de edad se dedica desde hace 10 años a la agricultura siembra maíz y frijoles, cuando su cosecha ya esta lista la almacena  en los graneros que muestra la fotografía para luego comercializarla en los diferentes mercados que se encuentran cerca de su casa, es madre soltera vive en casa propia con sus tres hijos, Vilma está solicitando un crédito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas, etc. para poder continuar con su trabajo y tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en: Vilma is 31 years old. For 10 years, she has worked in agriculture, growing corn and beans. When her harvest is ready, she stores it in the granaries shown in the photograph to later sell in the different markets nearby her home. She is a single mother who lives in her own home with her three children. Vilma is asking for a loan to buy seeds, fertilizer, compost, pest control, etc., to be able to continue her work and have better income.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizer, compost, pest control, etc.

loans.name: Mohammad

texts.en:
Mohammad is a 38-year-old married man from Gaza city. He lives with his wife and small children. He works as an employee a local company where he gets a low income. In the last violence in Gaza, his home was destroyed completely.
 
Moahmmad took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help him to pay the expenses of rebuilding his home. By taking this loan, Mohammad will be able to move back with his family and live in their house.

Mohammad appears in the photo in his destroyed house

loans.use: to pay the expenses of rebuilding his home.

loans.name: Joel Adalberto

texts.es: Joel de 35 años de edad vive en casa propia con su compañera de vida y su padre, el se dedica a la albañilería desde hace varios años, el quiere mejorar su vivienda colocando las puertas y repellando las paredes, pero con lo que obtiene de su trabajo no le alcanza para realizarlo por esa razón solicita un crédito para la compra de laminas, cuartones, cemento, arena, etc. para que el y su familia puedan vivir mas seguros.
texts.en: Joel is 35 years old and he lives in his own home with his life's companion and his father. He has worked as a bricklayer for several year. He wants to improve his home by installing doors and re-plastering the walls, but with what he gets from his job, he can't pay for it. That is why he is asking for a loan to buy sheeting, planks, cement, sand, etc., so that he and his family can live more securely.

loans.use: compra de laminas, cuartones, cemento, arena, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay the remaining balance for his university installments.

loans.name: Fernanado

texts.es:
Fernando es un hombre de 41 años, vive con su pareja, tiene 5 hijos de 23, 20, 16, 13 y 12 años, y su negocio es la pesca.
Él es buena padre, emprendedor, independiente, constante, responsable y trabajador. Su negocio lo desarrolla en la comunidad de ‘Corpachilaya’; caracterizado por su cercanía al lago sagrado Titicaca, área agrícola dónde se cría ganado; vacuno, ovino y camélido, se vive de la pesca y también de cereales y vegetales del lugar, como la quinua; el chuño, la haba, la papa, etc. caracterizada por el clima frío y seco, con una temperatura que varía durante el día entre 1-12 grados centígrados y donde los rayos solares golpean con mucha fuerza la superficie.
Fernando es de tez morena, baja estatura, cabello negro corto, su lengua materna es el Aymará que se habla en el lugar y habla español por cultura general y por el comercio que realiza. Su vida la comparte con sus hijos que se encargan de la agricultura y estudian en la escuela, su hijo mayor es independiente, viven en una casa construida de ladrillo con techo de calamina que cuenta con los servicios de electricidad y agua de pozo. Su negocio es la pesca de pejerrey en bote con red; La pesca del lago Titicaca es uno de los artes de pesca más bonitos, artesanos, y respetuosos con el lago y los fondos marinos que existen, ya que este arte de pesca consiste en arrojar al lago una línea de red, que suele ser desde 30 metros de largo. Al dejar caer la red en el fondo, y dejarla allí un día a modo de trampa, y luego simplemente recogerla, hace que no arrastre y destruya los fondos marinos, y solo queden atrapadas piezas del tamaño que se busca según grosor de red, y pescar solo las variedades que se quieren, “El pejerrey es mi especialidad, sólo me ocupo de esa variedad porque tengo clientes fijos…” comenta. Su sueño es tener una pescadería. El desea realizar la compra de redes de pesca de pejerrey porque las que tiene se encuentran dañadas y necesita renovarlas. Esta es la 1 secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 10 años que viene realizando esta actividad.
Es por esos motivos que Fernando solicita un préstamo para la compra de redes para pescar pejerrey y abastecer a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Fernando is 41 years old and lives with his partner. He has five children aged 23, 20, 16, 13 and 12. He has a fishing business.

He is a good father, and is enterprising, independent, reliable, responsible and hard-working. He carries on his business in the town of Corpachilaya on the shores of the sacred lake Titicaca. This is an agricultural region dedicated to rearing livestock such as cattle, sheep and llamas. The people live off fishing and local cereals and vegetables, such as quinoa, chuño, beans and potatoes. The climate is cold and dry, with daytime temperatures varying between 1-12 degrees centigrade, and the sun beating down on the land.

Fernando is dark-skinned and short with short black hair. His mother tongue is Aymara, the language spoken in his region, and he also speaks Spanish, especially when trading. He shares his life with his children, who work in agriculture and study at school. His eldest son is already independent. They live in a house made of bricks, with a corrugated roof, an electricity supply, and a water well. 

Fernando has a business fishing pejerrey in his small boat with a net. Fishing on Lake Titicaca is one of the most beautiful forms of fishing as it is done by small-scale fishermen who respect the lake and the lake bed. The fishing method used consists of throwing a 30-metre-long net into the lake. The lake sinks to the bottom, and is left for the day. The following day it is brought up, without trawling or destroying the lake bed. What's more, the net is designed to only catch the right size and species of fish.

Fernando explains “pejerrey fish are my specialty. I only catch that variety because I have regular customers". His dream is to have a fishmonger's.
He would like to buy more nets to catch pejerrey because the nets he has at the moment are damaged and he needs to renew them. This is his first series of loans with the institution in the ten years he has worked as a fisherman.

It is for this reason that Fernando is requesting a loan to buy nets to catch pejerrey fish to sell to his customers.

loans.use: to buy nets to catch pejerrey fish to sell to his customers.

loans.name: Merlyn Judith

texts.es: Doña Merlyn está muy agradecida y contenta porque su experiencia con COMIXMUL alivio y dio oportunidad y seguridad a que sus cultivos de café no fueran afectados por plagas ni por la roya pues los inversionistas en la plataforma de KIVA ayudaron a que su propósito para la temporada anterior fuera posible la compra de insumos agrícolas que evitaran la destrucción de la planta y la pérdida del grano. Ella manifiesta estar muy contenta porque le apoyaron cuando más necesitaba y dice que es de esta manera que las personas se vuelven fieles y encariñan con instituciones como la cooperativa COMIXMUL ya que el apoyo es en el momento más oportuno y le abren las puertas para invertir en un rubro con un grado de riesgo considerable ya que cuando no se tiene el dinero necesario para comprar los insumos la cosecha se puede perder en su totalidad. Por lo que en esta nueva ocasión ella solicita ser apoyada nuevamente para que esta temporada sea mejor que la anterior comprando abono, foliares, fertilizantes entre otros más el pago de mano de obra que serán de gran ayuda para salir adelante y mejorar su cafetal y producción de la misma.
texts.en: Merlyn is very grateful and happy because her experience with COMIXMUL helped her and gave her an opportunity and security so her coffee crops weren't affected by disease or by rust. The KIVA investors helped make her objectives for the last season possible with the purchase of agricultural materials to avoid plant destruction and the loss of the bean. She says that she is very happy because she was helped when she needed it the most and she says that this is how people become loyal and affectionate towards institutions like the COMIXMUL cooperative. The help comes at the best time and and it opens the doors to invest in an area that has a high level of risk, because when the money isn't available to buy the materials, the whole harvest can be lost. That is why, at this time, she is asking for help again so that this season will be better than the last, by buying compost, foliar sprays, fertilizer and more, as well as to pay for labor and improve her coffee crop and its yield.

loans.use: to buy materials and pay for labor to help her coffee crops.

loans.name: Rosa Delia

texts.es: Rosa de 44 años de edad estudió la primaria únicamente por su situación económica sus padres no pudieron seguirle ayudando para que estudiara. Ella está casada y es madre de cinco hijos pero solo 2 están viviendo con ella y su esposo los cuales le apoyan en el trabajo de campo mientras no están en sus actividades escolares. Rosa trabaja en el campo desde muy temprana edad siendo sus padres quienes la involucraran en la actividad económica de la familia. Su esposo trabaja como maestro de educación quien imparte clases en el colegio de la comunidad. La propiedad donde está sembrado el café está en la misma zona donde su casa de habitacion está construida aproximadamente a 10 minutos de camino. Ella se levanta muy temprano a hacer los oficios del hogar, la alimentación de sus hijos y despacharlos al colegio así como también la atención a su esposo para después trasladarse a la parcela de tierra y dar la atención que esta necesita para su cuidado. Rosa está solicitando el crédito a la cooperativa COMIXMUL para la compra de fertilizantes, abonos, foliares, entre otros y para pagar la mano de obra con la que podrá dar un mejor uso a los insumos y un mejor aprovechamiento. Con esto ella espera un mejor ingreso económico para la familia. Rosa, sueña con ver a sus hijos en una mejor situación económica, con mejores oportunidades de trabajo, así como también poder vender en su momento a buen precio su cosecha para lograr tener buenas ganancias ya que con esto ayudará a contribuir en el desarrollo integral de sus hijos.
texts.en: Rosa is 44 years old. She only went to primary school because her parents' financial situation meant they couldn't keep supporting her education. She is married and the mother of five children, but only 2 are living with her and her husband. They help her with the field work when they are not in school. Rosa has been working in the fields since she was very young. It was her parents who involved her in this family economic activity. Her husband works as a school teacher, teaching classes in the community high school. The property where she grows coffee is in the same area as her house, which is built about 10 minutes away from the road. She gets up very early to do the housework, to feed her children and send them off to high school, as well as to tend to her husband, to later go to the land parcel and turn her attention to what it needs for its care. Rosa is asking for the loan from the COMIXMUL cooperative to buy fertilizer, compost, foliar spray, and more as well as to pay for labor to make better use of the materials. With this, she hopes to have better income for her family. Rosa dreams of seeing her children in a better financial situation with better work opportunities, as well as to sell her harvest at a good price to have good profit. This will help contribute to a full development of her children.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, compost, and to pay for labor to help her coffee crop.

loans.name: Lorena Estely

texts.es:
Lorena, de 35 años de edad, estudio hasta noveno grado, está acompañada, su compañero de vida es vigilante en un centro comercial; ella es madre de dos hijos, uno de ellos está estudiando noveno grado y la otra estudia tercer grado, en su casa vive su madre.

Lorena, trabaja como empleada de cocina, en un restaurant de su pueblo desde hace dos años, ella decidió trabajar de esta manera ya que necesitaba ayudarle a su esposo con los gastos de la casa. 
De su casa al trabajo hay dos kilómetros de distancia, además otra fuente de ingresos que ella tiene, es la venta de pupusas, la hace en un horario de 5:30 a 9:30 p.m. pero solo los días que no va al restaurante, su madre le ayuda a la elaboración de las pupusas.

Lorena, utilizara el financiamiento para comprar una plancha de hacer pupusas más grande.

El sueño de ella, es tener una tienda bien surtida, con todos los productos necesarios.- Además, quiere que su pupuseria esté al servicio más días en la semana y le gustaría contratar a una muchacha que le ayude en su tienda, mientras ella trabaja en el restaurante.
texts.en:
Lorena is 35 years old and left education after the ninth grade. She has a partner who works as a security guard in a shopping centre. She has two children, one of whom studies in the ninth grade and the other in the third grade. Her mother also lives with them.

Lorena has worked as a chef in a local restaurant for two years. She decided to get the job to help out her husband with the household expenses. The restaurant is two kilometres from her home.

She also works selling pupusas, traditional El Salvadorian thick corn tortillas with a variety of fillings. She does this from 5:30 to 9:30 p.m. on the days she isn't working in the restaurant, and her mother helps her to make the pupusas.

Lorena will use the loan to buy a bigger grill to make pupusas.

Her dream is to have a well-stocked store full of all the necessary products. She also wants to open her pupusa business more days of the week and she would like to hire someone to help out in her store while she works at the restaurant.

loans.use: to buy a bigger grill to make pupusas, or thick corn tortillas.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a new rickshaw for his flower business.

loans.name: Ahmad

texts.en:
Ahmad is a 22-year-old single man from Khan Younis. His father is an employee in the public sector where he gets a low income. This income barely covers all the family needs. 

Ahmad wants to start his own business, which is a poultry farm. It is a very good business and Ahmad is very excited to open it.

Ahmad took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help him to buy chicks and feeds for his new business. By taking this loan, Ahmad will be able to improve the family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy chicks and feed for his new business.

loans.name: Abeer

texts.en:
Abeer is a 21-year-old married lady from Jericho. Her husband works as an employee in a local firm where he gets a low income.  

Abeer has a small store for selling women clothes. It is a good business and the demand is high.
 
Abeer want to improve her store so she took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help her to buy a new collection for her clothing store to resell. By taking this loan, Abeer will be able to increase sales and also her income.

loans.use: to buy a new collection for her clothing store to resell.

loans.name: Adel

texts.en:
Adel is a 26-year-old married man from Khan Younis city. He is a father for two sons and one daughter. Adel works as an employee in the public sector where he gets a low income. He also started another business, which is selling hot drinks on a stall in the city. It is a very good business and supports the family with a good income. 

Adel took a USD Murabaha loan from FATEN. This loan will help him to buy some supplies for his hot drinks stall. By taking this loan, Adel's productivity will be increased and also his income.

loans.use: to buy some supplies for his hot drinks stall.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more fruits and vegetables for his store to resell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy citrus seedlings for the farm.

loans.name: Fahed

texts.en:
Fahed is a 36-year-old married man from Gaza city. He is a father of two sons and one daughter. He works as an employee in the public sector where he gets a low income. 

In the last violence in Gaza, his home was destroyed completely. The whole family moved to live in a small rental house.
 
Fahed took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help him to buy stones to rebuild a small room in his destroyed house. By taking this loan, Fahed will be able to move back with his family and live in their house.

loans.use: to buy stones to rebuild a small room in his destroyed house.

loans.name: Boulathié

texts.fr:
L’emprunteur s’appelle Boulathié, elle est marié et mère de famille. Elle habite un village située à environ 35km de la ville principale. Elle s’active dans le petit commerce depuis 10 ans en vendant des fruits. Elle est une cliente régulière à la caisse car ses crédits antérieurs ont eu un impact positif dans l’organisation de sa vie. Elle réussi à gérer ses besoins personnels sans trop fatiguer son époux. Boulathié en est à son huitième crédit qui va lui permettre d’acheter des fruits : pomme, banane, clémentine pour revendre.
Elle veut augmenter son capital pour pouvoir développer son commerce en augmentant la quantité qu’elle achète pour revendre.
texts.en:
The borrower is called Boulathié, she is married and a mother.  She lives in a village situated about 35 km from the main town and has run a small fruit business for 10 years.  She is one of the branch's regular clients as her previous loans have had a positive impact in the organisation of her life.  She succeeds in meeting her personal needs without too much burden on her husband. 

Boulathié is on her eighth loan which will allow her to buy fruit: apples, bananas and clementines to resell.  She wishes to increase her capital in order to be able to develop her business through increasing the volume which she buys for resale.

loans.use: to buy fruits (apples, bananas, clementines) for resale

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To purchase construction materials to renovate her house.

loans.name: Pedro Regalado

texts.es:
