Recently, she applied for a loan to purchase stocks and materials for her buy-and-sell business. She is adding an extension shop in a nearby barangay, and she wishes to earn more doing this type of business.

loans.use: to purchase stocks and materials for her buy-and-sell business.

loans.name: Modestina José

texts.es:
Modestina es una joven trabajadora de 23 años de edad que estudió hasta 9° grado, está casada y tiene 2 hijos que aún no asisten a la escuela, su esposo trabaja en una comercial de productos de primera necesidad. 

Modestina se dedica a los oficios del hogar y a cuidar a sus hijos pero piensa sacar adelante un proyecto de una granja de pollos de engorde. 

Ella necesita el crédito para comprar materiales para construir la granja de pollos para criarlos y luego venderlos.
Ella a futuro piensa tener una granja más grande con muchos más pollos y además desea ver sus hijos crecer y que vayan a la escuela.
texts.en:
Modestina is a hardworking young woman. She's 23 years old and studied up to 9th grade. She's married and had two children that don't go to school yet. Her husband works at a commercial grocery store.

Modestina is a housewife and takes care of the children. However, she is planning to start a project for a chicken farm. 

She needs the loan to buy materials to build the farm and raise the chickens to sell them later.
In the future she wants to have a bigger farm with more chickens and wants to see her children grow and go to school

loans.use: to buy materials to build a chicken farm, raise them and sell them later.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase grains.

loans.name: Remedios

texts.en:
Remedios is a a hard-working mother who is always out in the streets, selling her fish. She is a very diligent and determined fish vendor and she works twice as hard, so she can sustain the needs of her family. She is from Sindangan, Zamoboanga del Norte. 

Remedios has applied for her membership with Paglaum Multi-Purpose Cooperative (PMPC) and she appreciates the programs and services of the Cooperative. 

Remedios is in need of capital to purchase more fish to sell. She asked for financial assistance from PMPC, in the amount of PHP 4,000, and she is thankful to them for financing her capital needs. In addition, she wants to expand her business and to manage it well for her loyal customers. 

Remedios deeply wishes that, someday, she could own a space where she can display her fish.

loans.use: to purchase more fish to sell.

loans.name: Myrna

texts.en:
Myrna is 48 years old who is very responsible with her household obligations since she has always been known to provide the best for her family. She currently lives with her husband and one child. Myrna has manicure and foot spa skills.

Consequently, she has requested a loan that will enable her to purchase new sets of manicure and spa items so that she can give quality serves and continue to put bread on the table in her home.

loans.use: to buy new sets of manicure items.

loans.name: Geraldine

texts.en: Geraldine has been running a small grocery store for three years and earns enough to sustain her family's needs. Geraldine is 33 years old, married and has three children. She is from Singangan, Zamboanga del Norte. Geraldine joined PMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and ability to engage in business activities. Geraldine has successfully repaid her previous loans from PMPC. Recently, Geraldine requested a loan of 5,000 PHP to expand her existing business. She wants to buy more inventory for her store to increase stock.

loans.use: to buy more inventory for her store to increase stock

loans.name: Felisa

texts.en: Felisa is 66 years old and lives in Masubong, Sapang Dalaga, Philippines. She has experienced hardships, especially in raising her family. This industrious member plows the rice field and plants pineapple. In need of additional working capital, Felisa joined Paglaum Cooperative. She has received several loans and recently requested a loan for 20,000 PHP, which she will use for labor for rice field plowing and pineapple planting. Being a MIGS member (Member in Good Standing) of the cooperative, she has been able to manage her income and provide for the daily needs of her family.

loans.use: to pay labor for plowing rice field and planting pineapple

loans.name: Rosa Margarita

texts.es: Rosa de 50 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo y sus dos hijos, ella se dedica a la venta de maíz desde hace varios años,  Rosa quiere mejorar su vivienda cambiando el piso y poniendo la conexión de agua potable pero no tiene de suficiente capital por esa razón solicita un crédito para la compra de cerámica, arena, cemento,tubos para conexión de agua y pago de mano de obra para que ella y su familia puedan vivir mas cómodos y en lo limpio.
texts.en:
Rosa is 50 years old and lives in her own home with her husband and their two children. For several years, she has earned her living selling maize.

Rosa wishes to improve their home by changing the flooring and adding a connection to the drinking water supply, but she does not have enough capital. She is therefore seeking a loan in order to buy tiles, sand, cement, and pipes for the water connection, and to pay for labour, so that she and her family can live more comfortably and in greater cleanliness.

loans.use: to pay for tiles, sand, cement, pipes and labour for a drinking water connection and new flooring.

loans.name: Maria Magdalena

texts.es:
María, estudio hasta segundo grado, está acompañada y su pareja trabaja en la alcaldía de su municipio y sus labores son de limpieza, tiene 3 años de trabajar ahí; ella desde los 13 años de edad, se ha dedicado a lavar ropa, hacer tortillas y a otros oficio del hogar, de esa manera a sacado adelante a su familia.- Sus hijos trabajan y le ayudan.

María, siempre a vivido en casa alquilada y en muchas ocasiones a tenido dificultades económicas, tanto así que algunas veces a preferido pagar el alquiler y no comprar comida, zapatos o vestuario.

Por esa razón María, solicita el crédito para pagar el alquiler de la casa donde vive, ya que no cuenta con el dinero para hacerlo.

Ella sueña con, con comprar una casa, para no andar pagando y cambiándose de un lugar a otro.- Además, desea con celebrarle a su último hijo sus 15 años y ayudarlo para que estudie.
texts.en:
María studied up to second grade. She has a partner, who for the last three years has worked in their town's mayor's office as a cleaner. Since she was 13 years old, María herself has earned a living washing clothes, making tortillas and working in other domestic jobs. In this way she has done her best for her family. Her children also work and help her.

María has always lived in a rented house, and has often had financial problems, so much so that sometimes she has preferred to pay the rent and not to buy food, shoes or clothes.

Dor this reason, María is seeking a loan in order to pay the rent on the house where she lives, as she finds herself without the money to do so.

Her dream is to buy her own house, so as not to be paying rent and moving from place to place. She also wishes to celebrate her youngest child's 15th birthday, and to support them in their studies.

loans.use: to pay the rent on the house where she lives.

loans.name: Marilyn

texts.en:
Marilyn is a married woman with five children. She is 46 years old and has three children who are in school. She is a very hard working entrepreneur.

Marilyn has a candle making business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for 2 years. Marilyn requested a PHP 15,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy raw materials for her candle making business.

In the future, Marilyn would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy raw materials for candle making

loans.name: Ana Lucia

texts.es: A sus 40 años de edad Ana es madre soltera, tiene 3 hijas de las edades de 15, 18 y 23 años de edad, de las cuales solo la de 15 años se encentra estudiando, Ana as una señora trabajadora que se dedica a la venta de ropa y también trabaja de empacadora en una fabrica de frutas, Ana va a invertir el crédito en la compra ropa para mejorar sus ingresos y apoyarse en los gastos de sus hijas.
texts.en: At 40 years old Ana is a single mother of three daughters ages 15, 18 y 23. Only the 15-year-old goes to school. Ana is a hardworking lady that sells clothes and also works in a fruit packing company. Ana will invest the loan in buying clothes to improve her income and help pay for her daughter's expenses.

loans.use: To buy clothing for sale

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy an Elsa clean cook stove.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy school supplies.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy cereals and peanuts

loans.name: Gabriel

texts.es: Gabriel de 62 años de edad se dedica desde hace varios años a la agricultura siembra maíz y frijol, comercializa sus productos en los diferentes mercados que se encuentran cerca de su casa, vive con su esposa en casa propia, el está solicitando un crédito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas, etc. y mejorar el terreno que muestra en la fotografía para poder continuar con su trabajo y tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
Gabriel is 62 years old and for years has earned his living as a farmer, planting maize and beans. He sells his produce in the different markets located near his home. He lives with his wife in their own home.

He is seeking a loan in order to buy seed, fertiliser, manure, pesticides, etc, and improve his land – shown in the photo – so that he can carry on with his work and improve his income.

loans.use: to buy seed, fertiliser, manure, pesticides, etc, and improve his land.

loans.name: Enio Inocente

texts.es: Enio de 48 años de edad vive en casa propia con sus tres hijos y su esposa, el se dedica desde hace 20 años a la agricultura al cultivo de maíz y maicillo, cuando ya está su cosecha la comercializa en los pueblos aledaños, ya tiene muchos clientes fijos, Enio está solicitando un crédito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas, herbicidas, etc. y mejorar el terreno que muestra en la fotografía para poder continuar con sus cultivos ya que esa es su única fuente de trabajo y así tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
Enio, 48 years old, lives in his own house with his three children and his wife. For 20 years he has made his living in agriculture growing corn and sorghum. When his crop is ready, he sells it in neighboring villages. He has a lot of regular customers.

Enio is applying for a loan to buy seeds, fertilizers, compost, pest control, herbicides, etc., and to improve the land that is shown in the photo in order to continue with his crops, since it is his only source of work. In this way, he hopes to improve his income.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizers, compost, pest control, herbicides, etc., and to improve the land.

loans.name: Alicia

texts.en:
Alicia, 62 years old, lives in Sindangan, Zamboanga del Norte. Her husband is a carpenter. Unable to sustain the needs of the family with only her husband’s income, she has found ways to earn income through snack vending.

She began by selling a small selection of snacks to her neighbors. She joined Paglaum Cooperative, which helped her in capitalizing her chosen business. She became a member in good standing, which is why she has received loans several times already.

Now, she applies for 6,000 PHP to pay for additional raw ingredients for her snack vending. She hopes that her business will continue, so that she can give her family a better life.

loans.use: to pay for additional raw ingredients for her snack vending

loans.name: Uruila

texts.ru: Уруйла, 52 года, вдова. Все дети взрослые и самостоятельные. У Уруйлы среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи, с 1995 года занимается животноводством, полеводством и птицеводством, начав этот бизнес с покупки коровы и 10 индюков. Благодаря упорному труду Уруйлы, в хозяйстве имеется: 3 дойные коровы с телятами и 150 индюков, а также есть арендованная поливная земля размером 4,0 ГА и собственная - 0,4 ГА, на которой выращивается клевер, подсолнухи и пшеницу. На ежедневной основе Уруйла продает до 25 литров молока. Ее сельскохозяйственная деятельность приносит около 60,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, она обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS) на покупку птиц для перепродажи. Доходы от кредита Уруйла планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение ее бизнеса.
texts.en:
Uruila is 52 years old and she is a widow whose children are all grown up and on their own.  She has a high school education and, as the main source of income for her family, she has been raising livestock and growing crops since 1995.  She started this business with the purchase of a cow and ten turkeys.  Thanks to her hard work, her farm now has three dairy cows and heifers and 150 turkeys.  She also has a rented 4-hectare plot of land and her own .40-hectare plot of land on which she grows clover, sunflowers and wheat.

Uruila sells 25 liters of milk a day.  Her farming activities bring her about 60,000 som (KGS) per month.  With the goal of developing her business further, she has turned to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 100,000 som (KGS) to buy poultry for resale.  She plans to reinvest the income from this loan back into increasing her business.

loans.use: to purchase poultry for resale in order to increase her farm's output

loans.name: Jeneva

texts.en:
Jeneva is a businesswoman in Ozamiz City. She is 38 years old, married, and a member of Paglaum Multi-Purpose Cooperative (PMPC). 

Jeneva runs a retail store. Running this type of business has supported her family, especially in the education of her children. 

Recently, she applied for a loan to restock her store with basic commodities and other consumable items. Jeneva believes that having enough inventory would allow her to cater to her customers' needs. 

She is thankful that she has signed up for membership with PMPC, as her financing partner.

loans.use: to restock her store with basic commodities and other consumable items.

loans.name: Cristobal Alfides

texts.es:
Cristobal, de 61 años de edad, estudio hasta noveno grado, esta casado y su pareja es comerciante, tiene dos hijos, pero ya están casados.

Cristobal, tiene un negocio junto a su esposa hace quince años, juntos decidieron vender productos de aluminio y plásticos, para obtener ingresos y mantener a sus dos hijos, los artículos que venden más son: huacales, cacerolas, platos, cucharas, tazas, entre otros. El negocio les queda a diez minutos.
 
Cristobal, solicita el préstamo para comprar medicinas y otros gastos que tiene en su familia, de esa manera lograra solventar la necesidad existente del momento.

Cristobal, siempre ha tenido como objetivo mantener su negocio y con el tiempo hacerlo más grande y obtener mejores ingresos económicos.
texts.en:
Cristobal, 61 years old, studied until the ninth grade. He is married and his wife is a shopkeeper. He has two children, but they are already married.

Cristobal has had a business with his wife for 15 years. Together they decided to sell aluminum and plastic products in order to earn money and support their two children. The items they sell the most are: containers, saucepans, plates, spoons, and cups, among other things.

The business is 10 minutes from their house. Cristobal is applying for the loan to buy medicines and to pay for other expenses that his family has. In this way, he will be able to cover his current needs.

Cristobal has always had the goal of maintaining his business and in time, making it bigger and earning more money.

loans.use: to buy medicines and to pay for other expenses that his family has.

loans.name: Angelico

texts.en:
Angelico is 49 years old. He lives with his wife and 4 children in Sindangan, Zamboanga del Sur. Angelico has been operating a vulcanizing shop for 11 years already and earns a good income doing this type of business activity. He will use the profit to sustain his family's needs and to support his children's education.

Angelico has requested a loan to be used in purchasing additional equipment and machinery for his shop to expand his business operation and be able to provide quality service to his customers. Angelico has recently become a member of PMPC. In the future, he hopes to improve his shop and would love to employ people to work in his shop so that they can earn an income and support their own families.

loans.use: to purchase additional equipment and machinery for his shop to expand his business operation and be able to provide quality service to his customers

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: La joven a quien se le ha pixeleado la cara por tener 18 años de edad y vivir en zona de alto riesgo, se dedica desde hace un años a la venta de ropa de segunda mano, su negocio está ubicado en su lugar de residencia y tiene muchos clientes, la joven es madre soltera y vive en casa propia con su hijo, ella esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de mas ropa para damas y caballeros por mayor para poder continuar con sus ventas y así tener mejores ganancias.
texts.en:
This young woman, whose face has been blurred because she is 18 years old and lives in a high-risk zone, has worked for a year selling second hand clothing. Her business is located in her home, and she has many customers. 

She is a single mother, and lives in her own home with her son. She is asking for a loan for the purchase of more clothing for women and men at wholesale in order to continue with her sales and earn a better income.

loans.use: to buy more women's and men's clothing at wholesale.

loans.name: Nelly Marlene

texts.es: Marlene cruza por sus  46 años de edad, esta casada y tiene 3 hijos de 23,24 y 26 años, el esposo de Marlene trabaja de albañil, esta familia vive en una casa por la que paga arriendo y Marlene se dedica a la crianza y comercio de animales menores, sobre todo los días de feria que son los días sábado y domingo se dedica a la comercialización de comercio de chanchos, el crédito lo necesita para comprar chanchos y de esta manera seguir trabajando y luchar por una buena calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Marlene is in her 46th year of age. She is married and has three children who are 23, 24, and 26 years old. Marlene's husband works in construction and the family lives in a house that they rent. 

Marlene works raising and selling young animals, especially on market days, which are Saturday and Sunday. She earns her living selling pigs. 

She needs the loan to buy pigs so that she can continue working and striving to have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy pigs

loans.name: Narcisa

texts.en:
Narcisa is a married woman with two children. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur. Narcisa is 54 years old and has two children who are in school.

Narcisa has a fish-vending business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 15,000 loan through Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation, Inc. (NWTF) to buy additional boxes of fish to sell.

Narcisa has been in this business for eight years. In the future, she would like to save enough money, so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional boxes of fish to sell.

loans.name: Fidel

texts.es: Fidel de 68 años de edad vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar, el posee desde hace varios años un vivero ubicado en su lugar de residencia tiene muchos clientes ya establecidos que lo prefieren por lo buenos precios, con los que obtiene de sus ventas logra salir adelante, el esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de plantas ornamentales, tierra negra, abono, entre otras cosas y asi poder seguir con su trabajo que le genera buenas ganancias.
texts.en:
Fidel is 68 years old, and he lives in his house with his family. He has owned a nursery located at his home for several years. He has a steady clientele that prefer him because of his good prices. He gets ahead thanks to his sales.

He is requesting the loan to buy ornamental plants, black soil, and fertilizer among others, so he can keep working and making a good profit.

loans.use: to buy ornamental plants, black soil, and fertilizer among others.

loans.name: Gemma

texts.en:
Gemma is thankful that she was granted a 15,000 PHP loan, which she used to purchase various grocery items and products needed in her general store. She is glad that through her earnings she is able to send her child to school and meet their daily living expenses. 

She would now like to apply for a 20,000 PHP loan, which she will use to buy large quantities of grocery items like rice, coffee, soda, rice noodles, flour, eggs, oil and other items needed in her store and for her snack vending. Her income from her store is a stable source to sustain her family's basic needs and her child's education. She is thanking God and you in advance for the financial help that will be given to her and for the continuous success of her store. 

Gemma dreams of having a bigger general store and aims to give her child the best education possible to allow her better opportunities in life. Every week, she meets up with her fellowship group* to share stories of her work and to draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God that she studies.

*All Center for Community Transformation (CCT) community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to pay for additional grocery items and ingredients for her food vending business

loans.name: Trinidad

texts.en:
Trinidad is 49 years old and has six children. Since she became a member of Paglaum MPC, she has been a member in good standing.

Trinidad personally sells the catch from their fishing boat in nearby municipalities. She also wants to buy the fish catch of her neighbors so that she can sell more fish to the nearby fish market, where they will fetch higher prices.

To minimize their chances of a low or zero catch, they rely on having as much of the necessary fishing gear as possible. She already has floaters to help guard their fish cages. She wants to obtain financial assistance from Paglaum MPC in the amount of PHP 6,000 for the purchase of new nets.

She dreams of purchasing a new fishing boat in the future and is setting aside some savings from the daily sales toward this goal. She wishes to see her children have stable jobs as well.

loans.use: to purchase new nets

location.town: Sindangan - Tabon, Jose Dalman, Zamboanga del Nort

loans.name: Samson

texts.en:
Samson is 69 years old with five children.  Samson personally sells the catch from their fishing boat in nearby municipalities.  Since he became a member of Paglaum MPC, he has been a member in good standing for almost five years. 

He wants to obtain financial assistance from Paglaum MPC amounting to Php 15,000 for the purchase of new nets. He also wants to buy the fish catch of his neighbors so he can sell more fish to the nearby fish market, where they will fetch higher prices.  

In the future, he dreams of purchasing a new fishing boat by setting aside some savings from the daily sales. He wishes to see his children have stable jobs as well.

loans.use: to purchase new nets

loans.name: Criselda

texts.en:
Criselda thought she was in the right place when she joined the microfinance group of Paglaum MPC. She decided to give it a try after she learned she can avail financial assistance for her chosen business. Criselda has maintained her membership in good standing without records of default up to this day. She has taken several loans, and all were paid in a timely manner. 

Recently she availed a loan to purchase bags of feed and animal vitamins for her chosen business. 

Criselda wishes to continuously manage her business more effectively with the support of her family.

loans.use: to purchase bags of feed and animal vitamins

loans.name: Anonita

texts.en:
In the year 2008, Anonita learned of Paglaum MPC and the financial assistance it gives. As a farmer in Tudela, Misamis, she tried her luck and borrowed a loan to start her rice production. After several months, she was able to return her borrowed capital. To this day, Anonita feels she owes her good fortune to the Cooperative for having trusted her with the money she used for her business. 

Recently, she availed a loan to purchase farm inputs and fertilizer for the next cropping season. 

Anonita wishes to sustain her business and be able to supply rice in the neighboring towns.

loans.use: to purchase farm inputs and fertilizer

loans.name: Narcisa

texts.en:
Narcisa is a 43-year-old married woman with four children, two of whom are in school. She is a very hard working entrepreneur.

Narcisa has a fish vending business in the Philippines and has requested a PHP 12,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy additional boxes of fish to sell.

She has successfully repaid her previous loan and now she has requested another loan to further build her businesses.

Narcisa has been in this business for 25 years. In the future, she would like to save enough money so that she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional boxes of fish to sell

loans.name: Rita

texts.ru: Рита, 31 год, замужем, есть 1 ребенок. У Риты - средне-специальное образование, она работает учителем в школе, в качестве дополнительного дохода для своей семьи она занимается полеводством и животноводством, стартовав 11 лет назад с 3,000 сом (KGS), благодаря целеустремленности и трудолюбию Риты, на сегодняшний день у нее есть корова и 20 овец. На участке мерою 0,38 Га она выращивает клевер для заготовки корма для скота. Ежемесячный доход составляет около 19,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Рита обратилась в Банк "Бай-Тушум" за кредитом в сумме 60,000 сом (KGS) для закупки скота. Рита намерена увеличить поголовье, что непременно приведет к увеличению капитала семьи.
texts.en:
Rita is 31 years old, married, and has one small child. Rita has a specialized secondary education. She works as a teacher in a school. As an additional source of income for her family, she raises crops and livestock, having begun 11 years ago with 3,000 som (KGS). Thanks to Rita's determination and hard work, she currently has a cow and 20 sheep. On a plot of land measuring 0.38 hectares, she grows clover for preparing livestock feed. Monthly income amounts to about 19,000 som (KGS).

With the aim of further developing her homestead, Rita applied to Bai-Tushum Bank for a loan of 60,000 som (KGS) to purchase livestock. Rita intends to increase her headcount, which will eventually lead to an increase in her family's capital.

loans.use: to purchase additional livestock in order to increase her herd

loans.name: Zinat

texts.ru: Зинат, 48 лет, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают 5 детей. У Зинат среднее образование, работу в селе найти очень тяжело, однако надо содержать семью и воспитывать детей. Поэтому уже много лет, Зинат занимается сельским хозяйством, на сегодняшний день в ее хозяйстве есть 6 коров, 20 овец. На участке мерою 1,80 ГА она выращивает картофель и эспарцет для реализации. Также на ежедневной основе продает молоко. Ежемесячный доход Зинат составляет 10,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, она обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS) на покупку скота и кормов. Доходы от кредита Зинат планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины и накопить на капитальный ремонт ее дома.
texts.en: Zinat is 48, married, and is raising five children with her spouse. She has a secondary education. It is hard to find work in the village, but it is necessary to support a family and raise children. This is why she has been farming for many years. Today she has six cows and 20 sheep on her farm, as well as a 1.80 hectare plot of land where she grows potatoes and clover. She also sells milk on a daily basis and her monthly income is 10,000 som (KGS). With the goal of expanding her business in the future, Zinat applied for a loan of 50,000 som (KGS) with Bai-Tushum Bank to buy livestock and feed. She plans to use her profits to invest in additional livestock and save money to remodel her house.

loans.use: to buy livestock and feed

loans.name: Rebecca

texts.en:
Rebecca is a widowed woman with two children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Rebecca is 53 years old now.

Rebecca has a food vending business in the Philippines. Rebecca requested a PHP 8,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy ingredients for her food production business.

Rebecca has been in this business for 33 years. In the future, Rebecca would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food production business

loans.name: Nilda

texts.en:
Nilda is 55 years old and married with three children. Nilda works very hard to provide for them.

Nilda runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional items like canned goods, snack foods, soft drinks, candies, beer, noodles, bath soap, etc. to sell.

Nilda has been in this business for five years, and sells a variety of items such as canned goods, snack foods, soft drinks, candies, beer, noodles, bath soap, etc. 

Nilda would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy additional items like canned goods, snack foods, soft drinks, candies, beer, noodles, bath soap, etc. to sell

loans.name: Isidora Del Carmen

texts.es:
Isidora de 50 años de edad, es muy trabajadora y comprometida con su familia, está casada pero su esposo vive en EE.UU. y con el cual procreó 3 hijos.

Isidora, la mayor parte del tiempo lo dedica a su familia y a sus hijos, aparte de realizar los oficios domésticos en su casa también le gusta participar en actividad religiosas en su comunidad.

El crédito lo necesita para pagar unas deudas que adquirió porque su hija se enfermó de “Chikingunya”.

Su sueño es poner una tienda en un futuro y seguir trabajando con esta institución.
texts.en:
Isidora, 50 years old, is very hardworking and committed to her family. She is married, but her husband, with whom she had 3 children, lives in the U.S. Isidora spends most of her time with her family and her children. Apart from taking care of her home, she likes to participate in religious activities in her community.

She needs the loan to pay off some debts she took on because her daughter got sick with the Chikungunya virus.

Her dream is to start a store in the future and to continue working with this institution.

loans.use: to pay off some debts that she took on because her daughter got sick with the Chikungunya virus.

loans.name: Sandra Noemy

texts.es: Sandra de 31 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo, ella se dedica desde hace 15 años a la siembra de maíz y frijol su esposo le ayuda también en el cultivo, comercializa sus producto en los alrededores de la zona donde ella reside y ya tiene muchos clientes, ella está solicitando un crédito para la compra de insumos agrícolas como: compra de semillas, fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas, etc. y asi seguir con sus cultivos para tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
Sandra is 31 years old. She lives in her own home with her husband. She has worked for the past 15 years growing corn and beans. Her husband helps her with the farming. She markets her produce in the area around where she lives, and she already has many customers. 

She is asking for a loan to buy agricultural supplies such as seeds, fertilizers, compost, pest control, etc. With these she can continue farming in order to earn more income.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizer, compost, pest control, etc.

loans.name: Jose Luis

texts.es: El joven a quien se le ha pixeleado la cara por tener 22 años de edad y vivir en zona de alto riesgo, se dedica al cultivo de plátanos desde hace 2 años, comercializa sus productos en los diferentes mercados y ya tiene clientes establecidos, el joven vive en casa propia con su compañera de vida y su hija, el esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de fertilizantes, herbicidas, abonos, controles de plaga, etc. para poder continuar con sus siembras y asi poder tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en: This young man, whose face has been pixelated because he is 22 and lives in a highly dangerous area, has worked growing bananas for two years.  He sells his produce in different markets and he already has steady customers.  This young man lives in his own home with his life partner and their daughter.  He is requesting a loan to buy fertilizers, herbicides, manures, pest control, etc. to be able to continue with his planting and thereby improve his income.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, herbicides, manures, pest control, etc.

loans.name: Rina Elizabeth

texts.es: Rina de 39 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo y sus dos hijos, ella se dedica desde hace varios años a la siembra de granos básicos, vende sus productos en los diferentes mercados que se encuentran cerca de su casa, Rina está solicitando un crédito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas, herbicidas, etc. y mejorar el terreno que muestra en la fotografía ya que la zona donde ella vive las tierras son pedregosas pero sirven para cultivar y así pueda tener mejores ingresos para una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Rina is 39 years old and lives in her house with her husband and two children. For several years she has worked in the planting of staple foods, selling her products at different markets located near her home. Rina is applying for a loan to purchase seeds, fertilizers, manure, pest control, herbicides, etc to improve the land seen in the photograph, because the area where she lives has soil that's rocky but suitable for cultivation. This way she'll be able to have higher income to improve her standard of living.

loans.use: To purchase seeds, fertilizers, manure, pest control, herbicides, etc to improve the land.

loans.name: Ada Maribel

texts.es: Ada de 42 años de edad vive en casa propia con sus tres hermanos y su sobrina, ella se dedica desde hace varios años al cultivo de maíz, frijol y maicillo, con las ventas que realiza logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, ella está solicitando nuevamente un crédito para la compra de fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas, herbicidas, semillas, etc. así poder seguir con sus cultivos ya que le ha ido muy bien en las ventas estos últimos meses y es su única fuente de trabajo e ingresos.
texts.en: Ada is 42 and lives in her own home with her three brothers and her niece.  She has been growing corn, beans, and sorghum for several years; she is able to cover some of her household expenses with her sales.  She is requesting a new loan to buy fertilizers, manures, pest control, herbicides, seed, etc. so she can keep on planting, as her sales have been very good these past few months and this is her only source of work and income.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, manures, pest control, herbicides, seed, etc.

loans.name: Shaarbani

texts.ru: Шаарбани 56 лет, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают 5 детей. У Шаарбани - среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи она занимается животноводством и полеводством. Стартовав в 1985 году, благодаря упорному труду Шаарбани, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 3 коровы, 8 овец и 1 лошадь, а также есть земельный надел мерою 1,68 ГА, на котором ежегодно Шаарбани выращивает кукурузу, картофель и подсолнечник для внутрихозяйственного использования и реализации. Ежемесячный доход составляет до 30,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Шаарбани обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 130,000 сом (KGS) на покупку коров для увеличения поголовья скота, часть средств она направит на покупку корма для скота. Доходы от кредита Шаарбани планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины и хочет накопить средства на увеличение площади сарая.
texts.en:
Shaarbani is 56 years old, married, and together with her husband is raising five children. Shaarbani has a secondary education. As a main source of income for her family, she raises livestock and crops. Having begun in 1985 and thanks to her hard work, Shaarbani currently has on her homstead: three cows, eight sheep and one horse, and also has a plot of land measuring 1.68 hectares, on which annually Shaarbani grows maize, potatoes and sunflowers for internal consumption and sale. Monthly income amounts to 30,000 som (KGS).

With the aim of further developing her business, Shaarbani applied to Bai-Tushum Bank for a loan of 130,000 som (KGS) to purchase a cow in order to increase her livestock count, and she will use part of the loan to buy livestock feed.

Shaarbani plans to invest income from the loan in further propagating the count of domestic animals and wants to save money for increasing the barn area.

loans.use: to purchase some cattle and livestock feed in order to invest in her business.

loans.name: Jypar

texts.ru: Жыпар успешно погасила кредит, использовав его по назначению. Она благодарна Фонду Кива и всем, кто ей помог в финансировании. Целеустремленность и упорный труд позволили Жыпар развить свое хозяйство до 1 дойной коровы. На участке мерою 1,0 Га арендованной и 0,38 Га собственной земли она выращивает клевер и фасоль для реализации.  Ежемесячный доход на сегодняшний день составляет 10,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Жыпар обратилась в Банк "Бай-Тушум" за кредитом в сумме 25,000 сом (KGS) на покупку скота для увеличения поголовья. Доходы от кредита Жыпар планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины.
texts.en:
Jypar successfully repaid her loans, using it for its intended purpose. She is grateful to Kiva and everyone who helped her with funding. Determination and hard work have allowed Jypar to develop her homestead through one dairy cow. On rented land measuring 1.0 hectare and 0.38 hectares of her own land, she grows clover and beans for sale. Monthly income currently amounts to 10,000 som (KGS).

With the aim of further developing her homestead, Jypar applied to Bai-Tushum Bank for a loan of 25,000 som (KGS) to purchase livestock to expand her herd. Jypar plans to invest income from the loan in further propagating her quantity of domestic animals.

loans.use: to purchase additional livestock in order to increase her herd

loans.name: Ziminikire Group

texts.fr: Louis a reçu ce champ de ses parents et il y a planté de caféiers. Sa production est de bonne qualité quoique ses moyens sont insuffisants pour couvrir les charges liées à cette activité; il souhaite obtenir ce prêt afin de lever ce défi. Un autre problème est le marché d'écoulement sûr mais cela n'empêchera pas à Louis de rêver grand en projettant de se contruire une nouvelle maison et d'améliorer les conditions socio-économiques de sa famille à travers cette activité. Il est le chef de ménage et sur la photo, il pose avec son épouse.
texts.en: Louis has received this land plot from his parents and planted coffee trees on it. His produce is of high quality even though his means are insufficient to cover related costs. He would like to obtain this loan in order to meet this challenge. Another issue is finding a  stable market outlet, but this does not stop Louis from dreaming big and planning to build a new house to improve the socioeconomic situation of his family thanks to his business. He is the head of a family, and in the photo he poses with his wife.

loans.use: to cultivate his coffee plantation.

loans.name: En Group

texts.en: En is a 40-year-old widowed rice farmer of an only child who lives in the Tbong Khmum province in Cambodia. She has cultivated rice since 1990, making around USD 9 a day. Her child is at school. En, a group leader, doesn’t have a latrine to use and now she would like a group loan of three members. She will use her portion to buy foundation parts of a latrine. This loan will help her have enough finances to build a latrine and live in better conditions. Her plans are to expand her farmland, renovate her house, and support her child to earn a bachelor’s degree.

loans.use: to buy foundation parts of a latrine

loans.name: Battulga

texts.en: Mr. Battulga, 34 years old, lives with his wife, daughter, and son in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. He has been installing state number plates on automobiles since 2011. Last year, his wife began running a grocery store. Their children go to high school. Using his previous loan, he renovated his house and reduced coal usage greatly. Now he is requesting a loan of 3,000,000 MNT to buy foodstuffs in large amounts in order to increase working capital of his wife's business. By doing so, his wife will run her grocery store without worrying about inventory shortage.The borrower is a very hardworking individual who supports his wife in every possible way.

loans.use: to buy food stuffs in a large amount

loans.name: Anita

texts.en: Anita is engaged in running a retail store. She has been operating her business for more than a decade and earns a monthly net income of 4,000 PHP. Anita is 56 years old, married, and has four children. She is from Dapaon, Zamboanga del Norte. Anita joined PMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and ability to engage in business activities. Anita has successfully repaid her previous loans from PMPC. Recently, Anita requested a loan of 20,000 PHP, which will be used for the expansion of her existing business. She wants to buy more inventory for her store to increase stock and be able to gain additional earnings to sufficiently provide for her family.

loans.use: to buy more inventory for her store to increase stock and be able to gain additional earnings

loans.name: Adolfo Feliberto

texts.es:
En la ciudad de Carmen cada quince días se reúne el Grupo De Crédito Buenos Aires, este lugar se lo conoce por ser muy dinámico donde la mayoría de sus habitantes se dedican a la agricultura y a la cría de animales, por ser una zona con gran vegetación.
En este lugar vive don Adolfo, tiene 44 años de edad, mantiene una relación de unión libre  y de esta relación tienen 7 hijos mayores de edad, tres de ellos aun viven con ellos. Su esposa es ama de casa.
El señor Adolfo trabaja de guardia de seguridad en una empresa privada y realiza el crédito para que su mujer lo utilice en la cría de animales, él le ayudo a construir una pequeña granja en la cual se dedica a la cría de pollos, ella compra estos animalitos cuando aun están pequeños los mismos que cría por espacio de tres meses hasta que tengan un peso adecuado y luego los vende por libras a vecinos de sus localidad  o entrega a comerciantes en este lugar, así ella le ayuda con los gastos que genera el hogar ya que a el no le alcanza con lo que gana.
Este crédito lo va a emplear en comprar pollos, alimentos y medicinas para los animales. Lleva dos años en el Grupo De Crédito y  le gusta por los créditos adicionales que ofrece la institución. Sus sueños son darles lo mejor a su familia.
texts.en: The financing group Grupo de Credito Buenos Aires meets every two weeks in the city of Carmen. This place is known for its dynamism and the majority of its residents work in agriculture and raising animals, because the area has heavy vegetation. Adolfo lives in this place, is 44 years old and is in a commonlaw marriage from which he has 7 adult children, 3 of whom live with them. His wife is a homemaker. Adolfo works as a security guard for a private company and is applying for a loan so that his wife can use it for raising animals. He helped her build a small barn in which she raises chickens, purchasing these animals when they're still small and she takes care of them for a span of three months until they reach a sufficient weight. She subsequently sells them by the pound to residents of the community or delivers them to area shopkeepers. That's how she helps with household expenses since he doesn't make enough at his job. He'll use this loan to purchase chickens, feed and medicine for the animals. For two years he's been in the financing group and enjoys it because of the additional loans that the institution offers. His dreams are to provide the best for his family.

loans.use: To purchase chickens, feed, and medicine for the chickens.

loans.name: María Patricia

texts.es:
En la ciudad de Carmen cada quince días se reúne el Grupo De Crédito Buenos Aires, este lugar se lo conoce por ser muy dinámico donde la mayoría de sus habitantes se dedican a la agricultura y a la cría de animales, por ser una zona con gran vegetación.
En este lugar vive la señorita María, tiene 29 años  de edad, está soltera y  vive sola, ella es egresada en Administración de Empresas y contabilidad.
Doña María es una mujer muy luchadora que le gusta ganarse la vida a punta de trabajo honrado, ella tiene una pequeña oficina en la cual realiza trabajos contables y de tributación, son muchos los clientes ya sean personas naturales o empresas que le piden que les realice los trabajos contables, es por esta razón que ella solicito el crédito para comprar una computadora que le hace mucha falta para brindar un mejor servicio pues de esto depende su trabajo y los ingresos para el diario vivir.
Este crédito lo va a emplear en comprar una computadora e insumos de oficina. Lleva tres años  en el Grupo De Crédito y  le gusta porque con los créditos ella va mejorando su situación económica. Sus sueños es tener una oficina propia para no pagar arriendos.
texts.en:
The Buenos Aires Credit Group meets every 15 days in the city of Carmen; this place is known for being very dynamic, with the majority of its residents working in farming and raising livestock, as it is an area with a lot of vegetation.  

This is where María lives; she is 29, single, and lives alone.  She graduated from her studies in business administration and accounting.  

María is a very hardworking woman who likes to earn her living through honest work.  She has a small office where she does accounting and tax work; she has many clients, both individuals and businesses, who ask her to do their accounting.  For this reason, she is requesting a loan to buy a computer, which she needs to offer better service, as her work and daily living income depend on it. 

She is going to use this own to buy a computer and office supplies.  She has been with her credit group for three years and she likes it because her loans have improved her financial situation.  Her dream is to have her own office so she won't have to pay rent.

loans.use: to buy a computer and office supplies

loans.name: Ramonita

texts.en: Ramonita is from Sindangan, in the Philippines. She is 50 years old and has been a widow. Ramonita owns and operates a sari-sari store. She has been engaged in her business for over 11 years and earns approximately 4,000 PHP a month. Unfortunately she almost lost her capital when her husband got a serious sickness and passed away. PMPC came to Ramonita as a rescue to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and her ability to engage in business activities. Ramonita is requesting a new loan of 10,000 PHP, which will be used to purchase store inventory and used as working capital. She plans to use the revenue generated from the business to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase store inventory and use as working capital

location.town: Sindangan-Leon B. Postigo, Zamboanga del Norte

loans.name: Tranquilino

texts.en: Tranquilino thought he was in the right place when he joined Paglaum MPC. He decided to give it a try after he learned he can avail financial assistance for his chosen business. Tranquilino has maintained his membership in good standing without records of default up to this day. He has taken several loans and all were paid in a timely manner. Recently, he availed a loan to purchase bags of feed and animal vitamins for his chosen business. Tranquilino wishes to continuously manage his business more effectively with the support of his family.

loans.use: to purchase bags of feed and animal vitamins

loans.name: Carolina

texts.en: Carolina is married with five children, and lives in Sindangan, Philippines. She is a diligent and determined mother, who has always been known to provide the best for her family. Carolina earns a living by making snacks that she sells and also on consignment in shops and cafes. She decided to expand her business after learning that she could obtain financial assistance through PMPC. Consequently, she has requested a 5,000 PHP loan to buy additional ingredients to increase production. Her goal is to be able to display her snacks in every shop and place to eat in the area. With the help and support of her husband, Carolina smiles at the thought of having a good standard of living for her family.

loans.use: to buy additional ingredients to increase production

loans.name: Chynarkul

texts.ru: Чынаркуль 49 лет, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают 4 детей. У Чынаркуль среднее образование, долгие годы она занимается животноводством и полеводством. Благодаря упорному труду, в хозяйстве Чынаркуль на сегодняшний день имеется 2 коровы, 7 овец и 2 лошади, а также есть арендованный земельный надел мерою 1,0 ГА и собственный - 2,70 ГА, где она ежегодно выращивает картофель, пшеницу, ячмень и эспарцет для внутрихозяйственного использования и реализации. Ежемесячный доход составляет 17,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Чынаркуль обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 60,000 сом (KGS) на покупку бычков для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Чынаркуль планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины.
texts.en:
Chynarkul is 49 years old, she is married and she and her husband are raising four children.  She has a high school education and for many years she has raised livestock and grown crops.  Thanks to her hard work, Chynarkul now has two cows, seven sheep and two horses on her farm.  She also has a 1-hectare rented plot of land and her own 2.7-hectare plot on which she grows annual crops of potatoes, wheat, barley and sainfoin to use on the farm and also for resale.

Chynarkul's monthly income is 17,000 som (KGS).  With the goal of increasing productivity on her farm, she has turned to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 60,000 som (KGS) to buy steers to increase her head of livestock.  She plans to reinvest the income from this loan back into the farm to further increase her livestock count.

loans.use: to buy steers for fattening and resale

loans.name: Soledad

texts.en:
Soledad is 55 years old and has nine children. She is married and has one child in school.

Soledad is in the agricultural business raising pigs in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 20,000 loan through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Soledad has been in this business for 20 years now, and has borrowed three times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Soledad would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: Luceritos Dos Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “LUCERITOS DOS” iniciará el primer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Senkata, está compuesta por ocho  integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Maria es la Presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: venta de verduras, venta de ropa americana, tienda de carnicería, venta de comida, venta de mantas de vicuña, venta de chamarras.

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Maria es integrante, ella indica que hace cinco años que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por la invitación de una amiga que es cliente de la institución. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio venta de zapatos; da a conocer que este negocio lo aprendió hace años al observar a otras vendedoras a comercializar este producto, con un poco de capital decide implementar un negocio conjuntamente sus hijos. 

El crédito que ahora sacará es para el aumento de capital (compra de zapatos por mayor) que adquirirá de las vendedoras mayoristas de la de la ciudad de La Paz y posteriormente lo comercializará en su puesto de venta. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia económicamente, ya que ella vive en unión libre y tiene tres hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta el área de salud, las capacitaciones y el crédito que ofrece la institución.

En la imagen esta ausente un cliente ya que tuvo que marcharse a su negocio con urgencia.
texts.en:
The "Luceritos Dos" communal bank will initiate their first lending cycle in Pro Mujer as part of the Senkata regional office. The group is composed of eight members and is directed by a board of directors, of which Señora María is the president. The businesses run by the members of the communal bank are varied; among them are vegetables sales, American clothing sales, a meat market, food sales, sales of vicuña [a South American camelid similar to the alpaca] blankets, and coat sales.

The loan that they will take out will benefit small micro-businesswomen like Maria. She states that she has been a member of Pro Mujer for five years, joining on the invitation of a friend who is a client of the institution. Currently, she has a shoe-sales business; she explains that she learned this business years ago by observing other vendors selling this product. With a little bit of capital, she decided to set up a business jointly with her children.


The loan that she will now take out is for increasing capital to buy shoes at wholesale; she will acquire them from wholesale vendors in the city of La Paz and later sell them in her own stand. This kind of work allows her to generate resources to support her family financially, as she lives in a common-law marriage and has three children.

When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she responds that she likes the health aspect, the training, and the loans offered by the institution. 

One client is absent in the picture, as she had to return to her business in a hurry.

loans.use: to buy footwear at wholesale

loans.name: Maria Antonia

texts.es: María de 49 años de edad vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar, ella se dedica a la crianza de pollos y también al cultivo de maíz, comercializa sus productos en los pueblos aledaños y ya tiene clientes fijos, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, ella esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de pollos para poder continuar con la crianza y asi poder tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en: Maria is 49 years old, she lives at home with her family. She raises chickens and farms corn. She sells these products in nearby towns and has loyal customers. With the profits she is able to cover her home expenses. She is requesting a loan to buy chickens to continue raising them and have more income.

loans.use: to buy chickens

loans.name: Perla

texts.en:
Perla works hard to support her family. She is married and has a general store business in the Philippines.

Perla requested a 12,000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase more items to sell in her general store.

She has been in this business for five years now. She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase more items to sell in her general store.

loans.name: Nancy

texts.en:
As a widowed mother of three children, Nancy works hard to support her family.

She has a fishing business in the Philippines and also earns additional income from raising livestock. Nancy is borrowing PHP 16,000 through Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation, Inc. (NWTF) in order to purchase additional fishing gear and other equipment for her fishing business.

Nancy has been sustaining her business activities through her past 18 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream, to save money to expand her business, in order to improve their quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase additional fishing gear and other equipment.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy pharmaceuticals.

loans.name: Joanna

texts.en: Joanna is 42 years old, married and has only one child attending school. She helps her husband gain income through raising hogs for sale. She has been in this business for almost five years. She aims to strengthen this business to gain more income. Having inadequate capital, she wants to access an additional loan of PHP 25,000.00 to buy hog feed, vitamins and vaccines for her livestock. She believes that this financial assistance will be a great help for her to further improve the business.

loans.use: to buy hog feed, vitamins and vaccines for her hogs

loans.name: Tarcela

texts.en: In 2010, Tarcela learned about Paglaum Multi Purpose Cooperative and the financial assistance it gives start-ups. Tarcela tried her luck with a business focusing on her farming activities. She feels she owes her success to the Cooperative for having trusted her with the money she used as capital. Tarcela is borrowing another loan to pay for seedlings and compost and labor costs for cultivation. This will give her farming income a big boost. Tarcela looks for better business opportunities and would love to be in the position to help others.

loans.use: to buy seedlings and pay for labor

loans.name: Virgilia

texts.en: Virgilia is 56 years old and lives in Libertad, Sapang Dalaga, Philippines. She is married with four children. She retails rice to earn a living and has had this business for five years. She has requested a loan to purchase additional sacks of rice to retail. Virgilia has been a member of PMPC for three years. In the future, she hopes to save for emergencies.

loans.use: to buy additional sacks of rice

loans.name: Jocelyn

texts.en: Jocelyn is 52 years old, married and lives in Sindangan, Zamboanga del Norte, Philippines. She raises pigs from the neighborhood. The piglets' owners share in the profit upon sale, to be divided 60/40 or 70/30 depending on their agreement.  With a desire to earn more, Jocelyn decided to raise pigs on her own as well. Through Paglaum MPC, she obtained the capital to purchase her original piglet and feed. Now, she requests a loan of 10,000 PHP to buy additional piglets and bags of feed. She really hopes and prays that her business would grow and benefit her family. Someday, she wants to build a concrete pig cage to maintain more sanitary conditions.

loans.use: to buy additional piglets and bags of feed

loans.name: Genosaria

texts.en: Genosaria is 53 years old, married and the family lives in Sindangan, Zamboanga del Norte. She and her husband manage a vulcanizing shop. This is her way of earning a living and raising her family. She has had this business for 10 years and earns approximately PHP 6,000 each month. Genosaria has requested a loan to purchase an air radiator pump and other equipment for her vulcanizing shop to improve services. Genosaria has been a member of PMPC for a year. In the future, Genosaria hopes to own a comfortable space where she can relocate her shop to expand the business operation.

loans.use: to purchase an air radiator pump and other equipment for her vulcanizing shop to improve services

loans.name: Luisa Yajhaira

texts.es:
En la ciudad de Carmen cada quince días se reúne el Grupo De Crédito Buenos Aires, este lugar se lo conoce por ser muy dinámico donde la mayoría de sus habitantes se dedican a la agricultura y a la cría de animales, por ser una zona con gran vegetación.
En este lugar vive la señora Luisa, tiene 38  años de edad, está casada y de esta relación  tienen tres  hijos los mismos que estudian en escuela y colegio. Su esposo es albañil.
Doña Luisa es una mujer que siempre le ha gustado trabajar para ayudarle a su marido con los gastos del hogar, ella  hace mas de un año surtió en su casa  una pequeña tienda de víveres, allí vende todo tipo de productos de primera necesidad así como también carnes, legumbres, ella empezó su negocio  con uno de los créditos que recibió del grupo y con los siguientes créditos lo ha ido aumentando lo cual le sirve para ganar más clientela y obtener buenas ganancias. 
Este crédito es para comprar: arroz, azúcar, aceites y varios artículos más para surtir su tienda. Lleva más de 3 años en el Grupo de Crédito y le gusta porque con los créditos empezó su negocio. Sus sueños son seguir aumentado su negocio.
texts.en: The Buenos Aires Credit Group meets once a fortnight in Carmen, a city which has a reputation for being very dynamic. The majority of its inhabitants work in agriculture or cattle rearing, as there is a lot of countryside in the area. Carmen is the home of 38-year-old Luisa, who is married with three children who go to primary or secondary school. Luisa' husband is a builder. She has always liked to work so she could help her husband with the household expenses. For over a year now, she has been running a small grocery shop from her home, selling basic necessities such as meat and vegetables. She set up her business with one of the loans which she obtained through the group and she has used the subsequent loans to stock up with the things she needs to attract more customers and make good profits. She will use this loan to buy rice, sugar, oil and other goods with which to stock her shop. She has been a member of the Credit Group for more than 3 years and she likes it because it was because of their loans that she was able to set up her business.  Her dream is to keep expanding her business.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, oil, etc.

loans.name: Martina

texts.en:
Martina is a 43-year-old married mother of five children who are all in school. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. 

Martina has a buy-and-sell rice business in the Philippines. Martina requested a PHP 14,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy additional sacks of rice to sell.

Martina has been in this business for one year. In the future, Martina would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional sacks of rice

loans.name: Las Lechuguitas Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “LAS LECHUGUITAS” iniciará el primer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Villa Exaltación, está compuesta por nueve  integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Adela es la Presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: venta de verduras, servicio de transporte libre, venta de refrescos, venta de comida. 

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Adela es integrante, ella indica que es la primera vez que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por la invitación de una promotora de la institución que fue a visitarle a su domicilio. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de venta de comida; da a conocer que este negocio lo implemento por hace años al adquirir un contrato con una institución, posteriormente vio este negocio como fuente de economía constante. 

El crédito que ahora sacará es para el aumento de capital (compra de arroz y fideo por mayor) que adquirirá de las vendedoras de la ciudad de El Alto y posteriormente a la elaboración lo comercializará en su espacio de venta. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia económicamente, ya que ella vive en unión libre y tiene cuatro hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta el área de salud  y las capacitaciones que ofrece la institución.

En la imagen esta ausente una de las clientes, la razón es que se encontraba en el consultorio médico.
texts.en: The “LAS LECHUGUITAS”credit group is about to begin its 1st cycle with Pro Mujer, as part of the Centro Focal de Villa Exaltación. It has nine members and is led by a board of directors, on which Adela is the secretary. The members of the group run a variety of businesses including: selling vegetables, running transport service, selling soft drinks and selling food. The loan will help small micro entrepreneurs, including Adela. She says that she has joined Pro Mujer for the first time, at the invitation of a promoter from the institution who came to visit her in her home. She currently runs a business selling food; she says that she set up the business a few years ago when she got a contract with an institution and she later came to see the business as a constant source of income. She will use the loan to boost her capital so that she can buy rice and beans in bulk from wholesalers in the city of El Alto and then she will prepare food and sell it in her shop. This type of work enables her to generate the income she needs to support her family, as she lives with her partner and has four children. When asked what it is she likes about Pro Mujer, she replies that she likes the health area and the training which the institution provides. One of the client is missing from the photo because she had a doctor's appointment.

loans.use: Compra de arroz y fideo por mayor

loans.name: Zaida Yaneth

texts.es:
En la ciudad de Carmen cada quince días se reúne el Grupo De Crédito Buenos Aires, este lugar se lo conoce por ser muy dinámico donde la mayoría de sus habitantes se dedican a la agricultura y a la cría de animales, por ser una zona con gran vegetación.
En este lugar vive la señora Zaida, tiene 43 años de edad, mantiene una relación de unión  y de esta relación tiene cinco hijos de 26, 22, 20, 17 y 10 años de edad, el menor estudia en escuela, dos de ellos aun viven con ella. Su esposo es guardia de seguridad.
Doña Zaida es una gran ama de casa y buena esposa que realiza los créditos para ayudarle a su esposo con los gastos del hogar, ella vende productos de Avon (artículos de belleza, cosméticos perfumería y accesorios para damas), trabaja todos los  días y su forma de venta es puerta a puerta, una de su hijas le ayuda con sus ventas, ella también en su casa tiene una pequeña granja en la cual cría de pollos, compra estos animalitos pequeños y los mantiene por espacio de tres meses tiempo adecuado para que tengan un buen crecimiento para luego venderlos a vecinos del lugar,  así realiza estas dos actividades que les sirven para ganar sus propios ingresos.
Este crédito es para comprar alimento y medicinas  para los pollos y productos Avon. Lleva 5 años  en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta porque los créditos le son de mucha ayuda. Sus sueños son darles lo mejor a sus hijos.
texts.en: The Buenos Aires Credit Group meets once a fortnight in Carmen, a city which has a reputation for being very dynamic. The majority of its inhabitants work in agriculture or cattle rearing, as there is a lot of countryside in the area. Carmen is the home of 43-year-old Zaida, who lives with her husband and their five children of 26, 22, 20, 17 and 10.  The youngest child goes to school and two of the children still live with Zaida. Her husband works as a security guard. Zaida is a good housewife and wife who take out loans to help her husband with the household expenses. She sells Avon products (beauty products, cosmetics, perfume and ladies' accessories), working every day selling her goods door to door along with one of her daughters. She also has a small farm in her house where she breeds chickens. She buys them when they are small, looks after them for a period of three months until they have grown and then sells them to neighbours. So she has two businesses which enable her to earn her own income. She will use this loan to buy food and medicines for chickens and Avon products. She has been a member of the Credit group for 5 years and likes it because the loans help her very much. Her ambition is to do her best for her children.

loans.use: to buy food and medicines for chickens and Avon products.

loans.name: Kelvi Paul

texts.es:
Kelvi Paul tiene 25 años de edad, vive con su cónyuge en casa familiar en el distrito de Cayaltí, ubicado en la provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte de Perú. Es una comunidad pequeña en una zona rural donde la población se dedica principalmente a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería.

El se dedica a brindar servicio de transporte, cuenta con un vehículo (mototaxi) en el que realiza esta actividad, cuenta con más de 3 años de experiencia en el negocio, presta este servicio en los alrededores de Cayalti y cuenta con clientes quienes brindan muy buenas referencias personales y laborales de el. Solicita préstamo para realizar reparaciones y mantenimiento a su vehículo ya que actualmente se encuentra en mal estado, con eso Kelvi Paul espera brindar un mejor servicio a sus clientes lo que va a incrementar su nivel de ingresos y por ende mejorará su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Kelvi Paul is 25 years old and lives with his wife in their family’s home. They reside in the District of Cayaltí in Chiclayo Province, which is in the region of Lambayeque on the northern coast of Peru. Their small community is a rural area where the residents engage primarily in agriculture, trade, and livestock breeding.

Kelvi Paul provides transportation services. He has a vehicle (a motorcycle taxi) that he uses for his business. Kelvi Paul has more than three years of experience in this line of work. He offers his service in the neighboring areas that surround Cayaltí and has customers who have provided very good personal and work-related references on his behalf.

Kelvi Paul is requesting a loan in order to pay for repairs and maintenance of his vehicle, which is currently in bad condition. With this loan, he hopes to provide better service to his customers, increase his income level, and eventually improve his quality of life and that of his family.

loans.use: to pay for repairs and maintenance of his vehicle, which is currently in bad condition.

loans.name: Rebecca

texts.en: Rebecca is 62 years old and married with two children. She lives in Ozamiz City. For the past 12 years, Rebecca has been a farmer. She earns 90,000 PHP every four months and has been a member of PMPC since 2009. Rebecca is requesting a 30,000 PHP loan to purchase a mango sprayer for her business. In the future, she hopes to expand and improve her business.

loans.use: to purchase a mango sprayer for her business

loans.name: Marlene Concepcion

texts.es:
En la ciudad de Carmen cada quince días se reúne el Grupo De Crédito Buenos Aires, este lugar se lo conoce por ser muy dinámico donde la mayoría de sus habitantes se dedican a la agricultura y a la cría de animales, por ser una zona con gran vegetación.
En este lugar vive la señora Marlene, tiene 48  años de edad, está casada y de esta relación dos  hijos de 18 y 7 años los mismos que estudian en escuela y colegio. Su esposo es chofer.
Doña Marlene es una muy buena esposa que le gusta trabajar para salir adelante, ella tiene una pequeña granja en la cual se dedica a la cría de pollos, compra estos animalitos cuando aun están pequeños los mismos que cría por espacio de tres a cuatro meses hasta que tengan un peso adecuado y luego los vende por libras a vecinos de su localidad  o entrega a comerciantes en este lugar, así ella se gana algo sin salir de casa que les ayuda mucho.
Este crédito lo va a emplear en comprar pollos, alimentos y medicinas para los pollos para que estos tengan un buen desarrollo. Lleva más de 7 años en el Grupo De Crédito y  le gusta por el apoyo que recibe con los créditos. Sus sueños son dales lo mejor a su familia.
texts.en: In the city of Carmen the Credit Group "Buenos Aires" meets up every two weeks. This place is known for being very dynamic and where most of its inhabitants work in agriculture and raising animals, because of being an area of great vegetation. This is where Marlene lives. She is 48 years old. She is married and has two children, who are 18 and 7 years old and go to high school and school. Her husband is a driver. Marlene is a very good wife who likes to work to move ahead. She has a small farm where she raises chickens. She buys these small animals when they are still very little. She raises them for three to four months until they have the appropriate weight, and then she sells them by pound to neighbors in her community or she delivers them to merchants in this place. This way she earns something without having to leave her house, and this helps them a lot. She will use this loan to buy chickens, food and medicine for the chickens so they develop well. She has been more than 7 years in the Credit Group, and she likes it because of the support she gets with the loans. Her dream is to give her family the best.

loans.use: to buy chickens, food and medicine for the chickens.

loans.name: Modesta

texts.en:
Modesta is a 48-year-old married mother of five children, four in school. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur. 

Modesta has a buy-and-sell dried fish business in the Philippines. Modesta requested a PHP 6,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy additional dried fish to sell.

Modesta has been in this business for one year. In the future, Modesta would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional dried fish

loans.name: Virginia

texts.es:
Virginia está estudiando la carrera de derecho, porque le gusta ayudar a las demás personas, además tiene mucho campo de trabajo, y es por ello que se está esforzando.
Ella es una persona que se está esforzando por poder crecer y ser alguien en la vida. Comenta que le gustaría poder ser útil a la comunidad por medio de sus conocimientos.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en el pago de las cuotas de su carrera, de manera a poder seguir con sus estudios.
texts.en:
Virginia is studying for a law degree because she enjoys helping other people. In addition, she has done a lot of work in this field so she is doing the best she can.

Virginia is a person who is trying to grow and make something of her life. She says that she enjoys being useful to her community by utilizing her knowledge. Virginia is requesting this loan so that she can invest in the payment of her degree fees. This will allow her to continue her studies.

loans.use: to pay her university fees.

loans.name: 18 De Mayo Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “18 DE MAYO” iniciará el décimo primer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Juan Pablo II, está compuesta por ocho  integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Ruth es la Presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: venta de café, servicio de té, venta de verduras, servicio de transporte, venta de comida, venta de jugos, venta de lencería. 

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Ruth es integrante, ella indica que hace ocho años que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por la invitación de su hermana que es cliente de la institución. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de servicio de té; da a conocer que este negocio lo aprendió hace varios años indicando como ayudante de cocina, posteriormente con un poco de capital y conocimientos a cerca del negocio decide implementarlo independientemente. 

El crédito que ahora sacará es para el aumento de capital (compra de azúcar por mayor) que adquirirá de las vendedoras de la ciudad de El Alto y posteriormente lo implementará en su espacio de servicio para la elaboración de sus  productos. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia económicamente, ya que ella es soltera y tiene dos hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta el área de salud  y las capacitaciones que ofrece la institución y la atención de la Asesora.
texts.en:
The communal bank “18 de Mayo” will begin its eleventh cycle at ProMujer as part of the Juan Pablo II focal center. The group is composed of 8 members and is headed by a board of which Ruth is the president. Businesses that the members of the communal bank carry forth are varied. Among them are selling coffee, a tea service, selling vegetables, a shuttle service, selling food, selling juice, and selling lingerie. 

The loan is a great benefit for small microentrepreneurs like Ruth. She began working with ProMujer eight years ago, entering on the invitation of her sister who is a client of the institution. Today she has a tea business. She says that she began this business several years ago starting as a helper in a kitchen. Then, with a little capital and knowledge about the business she decided to establish her independent business.

The credit she is taking out if for an increase in capital to buy sugar wholesale from the sellers in the city of El Alto. She will use it to make products in her own service space. This way of working allows her to generate resources to support her family financially since she is single and has two children. 

When asked what she likes about ProMujer, Ruth says she likes the health services and training offered by the institution and the services of the loan officer.

loans.use: to purchase wholesale sugar for her tea service

loans.name: Juan Ernesto

texts.es: Juan de 60 años de edad vive en casa propia con sus dos hijos y su esposa, su hijo mayor trabaja y le ayuda económicamente, el se dedica desde hace 14 años a la agricultura, el quiere mejorar su vivienda cambiando el techo porque esta muy deteriorado por la lluvias, pero con lo que obtiene de sus ventas no le alcanza para realizarlo, por esa razón está solicitando a INTEGRAL un crédito para la compra de laminas, polines y pago de mano de obra para que el y su familia puedan vivir mas cómodos y seguros.
texts.en:
Juan is 60 years old. He lives in his own home with his two children and his wife. His older son works and helps him financially. He has worked in farming for the past 14 years. He would like to improve his home by replacing the roof because it is in very poor condition due to rain. What he earns from his sales is not enough to do this. 

This is why he is asking Apoyo Integral for a loan to pay for the purchase of sheeting and beams and to pay for labor, so that his family may be more comfortable and secure.

loans.use: to buy metal sheeting and beams, and to pay for labor.

loans.name: Litoral Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “LITORAL” iniciará el tercer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Villa Exaltación, está compuesta por once  integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Juana es la Presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: venta de chuño (papa deshidratada), venta de pollos, venta de comida, venta de verduras, venta de faldas, venta de frescos, venta de ganado, venta de salchipapa, venta de papa. 

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Juana es integrante, ella indica que hace dos años que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por la invitación de una promotora de la institución que fue a visitarle a su domicilio.
